dialogue_lines.title: First Meeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ahem! Hello, {NICKNAME}. Welcome aboard the Astral Express. My name is March 7th, I'm one of the passengers. We'll be working together. First, we need to take your induction photo... Did that scare you! Just a joke~

dialogue_lines.title: Greeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ah! You're just in time — we haven't taken our selfie today.

dialogue_lines.title: Parting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'm gonna get some rest after I've sorted these photos. Don't stay up all night playing video games again!

dialogue_lines.title: About Self: Name
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I came up with my name myself, but some people just call me March... Which do you prefer?

dialogue_lines.title: About Self: Past
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Maybe my past isn't behind me, but in front of me. That's why I'm gonna keep going forward, one stop at a time... train or no train.

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Juice
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ahh, juice... If I say the word, I get a craving. If I get a craving, I wanna drink some. And if I drink some... Ahh... I can't stop!

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Photos
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Of course photos aren't reality, but if you have enough of them, doesn't reality come a little closer?

dialogue_lines.title: Hobbies
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Taking pictures. Writing in my diary. What else is there to say~?

dialogue_lines.title: Annoyances
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I get really bored when no one's talking to me. When we're on the Express, Himeko and Mr. Yang are pretty busy, but Dan Heng's usually free. He doesn't like chatting though...

dialogue_lines.title: Something to Share
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Every time I'm done sorting my album and look out the window, I always want to take another picture... Even though I've seen the view a thousand times, I still feel happy looking at the stars like this.

dialogue_lines.title: Knowledge
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: No matter how disgusting the dish, you gotta summon your trailblazing spirit and face it! Not gonna lie though, jellied eels and Himeko's coffee are pretty tough to stomach...

dialogue_lines.title: About Dan Heng
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: ...Dan Heng got on the train before me. He never mentioned his past... If you get the chance, why don't you ask him about it?

dialogue_lines.title: About Himeko
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ahh, beautiful Himeko. She's sensible, reliable, and elegant. It's great to have her as the navigator... When I'm grown up, I'm gonna be just like her! I like the now me too though~

dialogue_lines.title: About Welt
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I heard Mr. Yang was once the leader of a secret organization and saved a whole planet! Not to mention he's been a teacher, and even a storyboard artist! *sigh* He must be an alien or something...

dialogue_lines.title: About Pom-Pom
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The conductor is the best!

dialogue_lines.title: About Dan Heng 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Even after we found out about his mysterious past, he's still the same Dan Heng we've always known!

dialogue_lines.title: Eidolon Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hee-hee, my past is gradually coming to light.

dialogue_lines.title: Character Ascension
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Today me is even more awesome than yesterday me!

dialogue_lines.title: Max Level Reached
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'm all grown up! My real journey starts now!

dialogue_lines.title: Trace Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: That's right! I still have a few tricks up my sleeve~

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With {NICKNAME}
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You're coming with? Hmph, I'm keeping score.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Dan Heng
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'm gonna show them what I can really do... Huh? Why the weird face, Dan Heng?

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'm gonna show them what I can really do... Huh? Dan Heng, you better believe in me!

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Himeko
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: If push comes to shove, I'm counting on you, Himeko!

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Welt
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Mr Yang's here! Yeah! Did I just say that out loud?

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I told ya I could fight!

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Oh great, another walk in the park.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You have the worst luck running into me.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: My turn~

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Idling
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: What's wrong? Afraid of what I might do?

dialogue_lines.title: Basic ATK
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Watch this!

dialogue_lines.title: Skill 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: With me out here, how can we lose~

dialogue_lines.title: Skill 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Stay right there while I give you a present~

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Light Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You're annoying!

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Go away!

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Activate
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Gotta try hard sometimes.

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Unleash
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Check out this awesome move~

dialogue_lines.title: Talent 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You can't run!

dialogue_lines.title: Talent 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Try that again!

dialogue_lines.title: Downed
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I don't want to... be alone...

dialogue_lines.title: Return to Battle
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Alright... I'm done messing around!

dialogue_lines.title: Health Recovery
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Thanks a lot!

dialogue_lines.title: Technique
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Freeze!

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Won
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You couldn't have done it without me!

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: *gasp* Shiny! *bigger gasp* Sparkly!

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Finders keepers~

dialogue_lines.title: Precious Treasure Opening
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Wow, there's so much!

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I deserve a nice pat on the back for that one!

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Done and dusted!

dialogue_lines.title: Enemy Target Found
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Crush now or crush later?

dialogue_lines.title: Returning to Town
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Wanna go take some pictures?

story.1: A spirited and quirky young girl who is into all the things girls her age are interested in, such as taking photos.\nShe was awakened from a piece of drifting eternal ice, only to find that she knows nothing about herself or her past. Though initially feeling dejected, she decided to name herself after the date of her rebirth.\nAnd thus, on that day, March 7th was born.
story.2:
Why does March 7th take photos?
"First of all, girls like me should like this kind of pastime."
"Besides, I won't forget anything that I keep a photo of."

What has March 7th come to learn about photography?
"Number one, when taking pictures of terrible cuisines, all the details must be clearly visible on the pictures because 'Taking pictures of food is equal to eating them. Every detail matters.'"
"Number two, as long as you take a picture with your eyes closed, you will be able to capture an expression of your subject with their eyes closed."

Why is March 7th always wearing her camera?
"Because if anyone ever seals me away in ice again, at least I'll have my camera with me!"

So why doesn't March 7th just use the camera on her phone?
"Oh yeah, why not — hang on, it's because of that sense of formality!"
story.3:
March 7th's ability is "Six-Phased Ice," but she has always insisted that it is not ice but some kind of condensed crystal.
"Come on, ice can't be this beautiful."

The bows and arrows March 7th uses in battle are also made of the Six-Phased Ice, but she is not satisfied with the fact that her weapon is a bow.
"Great warriors never use bows!"
"Besides, if I use my ice arrow to attack my ice shield, nothing will happen at all!"

March 7th has also worked hard to practice a unique skill called "Star Crazing: Glass Greatsword," but she never succeeded.
"March, judging by the name, it should be a greatsword, right?"
"Well, but it doesn't feel as good as an ice sculpture... smash."
story.4:
Compared to Pom-Pom the conductor, Himeko the pilot, Dan Heng the guard, and Welt the jack-of-all-trades, even March 7th has a hard time explaining her role aboard the Express despite calling herself a "warrior."
But March 7th's every move affects the crew's course of action all the time.

"Passenger March 7th slipped and fell..."
"March, watch out for the galena ball above your head."
"March, have you taken pictures of the sights over there?"
"I believe March. If she said it's not delicious, then it's truly not delectable."

Rather than calling March 7th someone who constantly worries people, it would be better to say that she works her way into people's hearts.
March 7th, of course, is oblivious to this, and is struggling to think up the right role for {NICKNAME}.
story.5:
For March 7th, who has been drifting in space, the situation in which she awoke isn't too bad.
She woke up on a passing train, and the people on the train looked friendly.
The only problem is that even though she has a reasonable understanding of what's going on around her, she still doesn't know anything about herself.

"Who am I? Where do I come from..." 

March 7th looks at herself in the mirror, imagining dozens of potential past lives for herself as she tries on the various outfits that Himeko had assembled for her.
But she can't be sure what her past was like, and what kind of past a girl like her should have...
The only thing March 7th can choose to be is her current self, and the only thing she can look forward to is the future.
She is both frightened and glad.

1.SimpleSkillDesc: N/A

1.SkillDesc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, there is a 1% base chance to Freeze a random enemy for 1 turn(s).\nWhile Frozen, the enemy cannot take action and will take Additional Ice DMG equal to 50% of March 7th's ATK at the beginning of each turn.
1.SimpleSkillDesc: Attacks the enemy. After entering battle, there is a high chance of inflicting Freeze on a random enemy.

dialogue_lines.title: First Meeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I should reintroduce myself. My name is Dan Heng — I'm the guard on the Express. I also administer the train's data bank.

dialogue_lines.title: Greeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I updated the data bank entries today if you wanted to look anything up.

dialogue_lines.title: Parting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Time to turn in already...? Thanks for the reminder. It's easy to lose track of time in the archives — before you know it, a whole day's gone by... See you tomorrow.

dialogue_lines.title: About Self: Past
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I come from an alliance, and was born on a grand and beautiful ship that I barely had the chance to see... I can never return.

dialogue_lines.title: About Self: Reason for Boarding the Express
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: At that time, I had nowhere to go but the Express.

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Cloud-Piercer
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Cloud-Piercer is always with me. For my safety, and the safety of everyone else.

dialogue_lines.title: Hobbies
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: It's not really a hobby, but I used to read a lot...

dialogue_lines.title: Annoyances
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: If you're not there to look something up, then please don't enter the archives. It's not a place for chitchat.

dialogue_lines.title: Something to Share
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: As vast as the universe is, it cannot change its past.

dialogue_lines.title: Knowledge
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Once there are sufficient records in the data bank, the flow of individuals will link together seemingly independent events.

dialogue_lines.title: About March 7th
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: March's weakness is that she likes to get involved in other people's business. ...Perhaps that's also her strength.

dialogue_lines.title: About Himeko
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: If you have questions about the Express, Himeko can give you the best answer.

dialogue_lines.title: About Welt
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Mr. Yang is a very compassionate person, but thankfully he doesn't pry.

dialogue_lines.title: About Pom-Pom
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: My intuition tells me that it would be unwise to provoke the conductor.

dialogue_lines.title: Eidolon Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: We mustn't cling to the past.

dialogue_lines.title: Character Ascension
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Just as a data bank requires updating, so I must keep evolving.

dialogue_lines.title: Max Level Reached
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Leave the past behind. The future beckons my thoughts.

dialogue_lines.title: Trace Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I will choose my own path...

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With {NICKNAME}
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Tread carefully, {NICKNAME}.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With March 7th
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: March, stay with the group, don't rush off.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Himeko
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Himeko, you can leave any contingencies to me.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Welt
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Mr. Yang, do you have any advice on this matter?

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Blade
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You... Keep your distance.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: It's too late to repent.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Move carefully.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Clemency? Never heard of it.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Step aside, I have no interest in stoking conflict.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Idling
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Don't hesitate.

dialogue_lines.title: Basic ATK
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The time is now.

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Light Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hmph.

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Careless.

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Activate
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The truth of life and death, revealed in an instant.

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Unleash
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: This sanctuary, is but a vision... Break!

dialogue_lines.title: Downed
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: This... can't be...

dialogue_lines.title: Return to Battle
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: This body isn't that frail.

dialogue_lines.title: Health Recovery
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Don't worry about me.

dialogue_lines.title: Technique
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: This will strengthen our position.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Won
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Past victories don't guarantee future ones.

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Worth our while.

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hmm... There is knowledge of this in the data bank.

dialogue_lines.title: Precious Treasure Opening
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: This should be securely stored.

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: That wasn't too difficult.

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Seamless.

dialogue_lines.title: Enemy Target Found
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: That enemy certainly isn't friendly.

dialogue_lines.title: Returning to Town
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Mm... I'll need to record today's notes in the data bank.

story.1: A cold and reserved young man who wields a spear known as Cloud-Piercer. He acts as the Express' guard on its long trailblazing expedition.\nDan Heng never talks much about his past. In fact, he joined the Express Crew to escape from a past of his own making.\nBut can the Express really help him outrun his past?
story.2:
A new dawn begins.

It's just another extremely average day aboard this giant ship. The markets have just opened and the morning dew is still fresh, but the young man crossing the street has never seen such a sight. Before he manages to notice all the differences between the actual city and its descriptions in books, he is immersed in savoring the warmth of the sun on the back of his neck.

It is his first time seeing his own body clearly. This body belongs to him. It belongs to this current name.

When he arrives at the port, the escorting soldier removes the last of his shackles. He walks forward without looking back. He can feel, ever so faintly, several pairs of eyes gazing at him from within the city. Eyes filled with hatred.

It isn't until the spaceship takes off that he turns his head and takes one final look at this place. It really is a magnificent and grand spaceship — just like the books say.

He only glances at it once, then turns his head away to where the stars shimmer dimly and an uncertain future lies.

He looks out in silence.
story.3:
A new dawn begins.

He steps off one IPC spaceship, then boards another. He'd never even heard of the ship's destination, but that doesn't matter. There is nowhere he particularly wanted to go. His only goal is to get as far away as possible from his past, from his "home."

On these spaceships, people come and go all the time. None of the IPC crews care who he is, so long as he can work.

He has changed his appearance and might no longer be recognized, but he knows that same power still lurks within him, unable to be shaken off no matter where he goes. This power drags him down, slows him, tries to overwhelm him, and makes him unable to escape his past. He has to be careful.

But he still can't shake off the man with the beastly eyes.

If others in his homeworld felt hatred toward him, then that man only has a killing intent toward him — even the spaceships he had traveled on were all annihilated. That man had died before him, but would reappear soon after.

Outside his homeworld, there's a larger world where anything is possible.
story.4:
A new dawn begins.

He boards another spaceship, and the passengers are all wearing different masks. He nearly has his memory stolen, and is forced to listen to a lecture that sounded like mad ramblings.

He knows that huge monsters prowl upon this route, but he could only find a way toward survival by traveling along the most dangerous of roads.

He defeats the huge monsters and disembarks at the next port. He thinks he could remain undetected among the countless ships, but he is stopped by a redhead woman. She salutes him in thanks, saying she is with one of the ships he had rescued.

He is about to turn and leave when he sees a parked train beside the redhead woman.

"Where's your next stop?"
"...Haven't decided yet."
"Then would you like to board our Express?"
"..."
"We're retracing our previous journey. There's so much to see all over again. We need a guard... And an archiver."
"..."
"You can get off any time once you made up your mind on where to go."
"Alright."
story.5:
A new dawn begins.

He rubs his eyes, realizing it had been too long since he had such a good night's sleep. He considers himself as only staying temporarily and refused the room specially prepared for him, making a simple bed on the floor of the Archives. However, he stayed up all night reading the data bank. At some point, he'd drifted off to sleep.

He opened the door to find the conductor standing there, reprimanding him for staying up late — Otherwise he'd miss out on a piping hot breakfast and would've wasted the care put into it. He nods and the conductor quietens down in satisfaction, wobbling as they lead him into the passenger car.

The redhead woman — who he now knows is named Himeko — flashes him a smile. The brunet man to the other side — Mr. Yang — remains silent despite appearing to have many questions on his mind.

Before he knew it, he'd spent many a morning just like this.

The process of re-visiting the route is not easy, mostly due to the numerous roadblocks caused by Stellaron. Sometimes, they would encounter the huge monsters he'd defeated before. They even found an enormous chunk of floating ice — encased in which was a living girl.

That's why he wasn't very surprised when he detected that the {M#boy}{F#girl} named {NICKNAME} has an actual Stellaron sealed inside {M#his}{F#her} body.

The Express' journey will continue on. Is there anything beyond the realm of possibility?

dialogue_lines.title: First Meeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Welcome aboard, {NICKNAME}. I'm Himeko, navigator of the Astral Express. I'm sure we're about to embark on a fascinating journey together.

dialogue_lines.title: Greeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hey there. Tired? How about a coffee?

dialogue_lines.title: Parting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Relax, Pom-Pom and I are here to take care of the train.

dialogue_lines.title: About Self: Relationship With the Astral Express
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The Express and I are like old friends — we've helped each other a lot. I fixed it so that it could get back to its original route, and in return it takes me to unknown frontiers.

dialogue_lines.title: About Self: Fixing the Express
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: As far as malfunctions on the train are concerned, I've usually dealt with them before you guys even realize anything's amiss.

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Final Stop
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'm speculating, but I think the Express departs from Akivili's home world and returns there before starting the journey anew. So the Express doesn't have a "final stop" per se — it's up to you where you disembark.

dialogue_lines.title: Hobbies
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I have a knack for blending different coffee beans. Can I make you a cup? I recommend not adding milk — black coffee is proper coffee.

dialogue_lines.title: Annoyances
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Seems like only Dan Heng has a kind word for my coffee. What do you think? ...Well, I've always thought that bitter is better...

dialogue_lines.title: Something to Share
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: When people live together it seems like nobody ever changes. Only when they're away from each other for a long time do surprising transformations occur...

dialogue_lines.title: Knowledge
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: When we scour the universe for the things we seek, most of the time it's less of a "Eureka, I found it!" moment and more of a "Is this it? What if I'm wrong?" moment.

dialogue_lines.title: About March 7th
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: If I woke up on the Express without any memories, there's no way I'd recover as quickly as March has. I admire her for that, but I also worry about her... If I'm ever too busy, please do take the time to chat with her.

dialogue_lines.title: About Dan Heng
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Dan Heng is the cautious type — I think he's gotten used to doing things by himself. He doesn't like to bother or inconvenience others. That's why I asked him to be the train's guard and maintain the data bank. I don't think he'd have joined us if there wasn't anything for him to do.

dialogue_lines.title: About Welt
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I think Welt's anxious that he can't keep up with you youngsters, but he sure seems young at heart to me...

dialogue_lines.title: About Pom-Pom
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: To Pom-Pom, I'll always be the train's mechanic, haha.

dialogue_lines.title: About Dan Heng 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: He's not so uptight nowadays. I think {NICKNAME} and March helped him understand that relying on others sometimes really isn't a big deal.

dialogue_lines.title: Eidolon Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The Express's path bridges the stars, as if it were a string of shimmering pearls.

dialogue_lines.title: Character Ascension
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: With countless marvelous sights to be seen, I couldn't possibly consider stopping here.

dialogue_lines.title: Max Level Reached
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Our final stop can never truly be reached.

dialogue_lines.title: Trace Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The human thirst for discovery is truly boundless.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With {NICKNAME}
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: If there's anything you need, don't hesitate to ask, {NICKNAME}.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With March 7th
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Make sure to keep yourself safe this time March... and remember, we're all in this together.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Dan Heng
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'll be right behind you with all the support you need, Dan Heng.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'll be right behind you with all the support you need, Dan Heng. Be fearless.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Welt
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: See, Welt, I told you we'd have lots of chances to shine.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I have something for you.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Be careful.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Combat is a series of precise machinations.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Time for a detailed overhaul.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Idling
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: It won't be so easy next time.

dialogue_lines.title: Basic ATK
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: One at a time!

dialogue_lines.title: Skill
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Come one, come all.

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Light Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Barely felt it.

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You've got a lot of nerve.

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Activate
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Perhaps you still don't understand...

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Unleash
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Humanity never conceals its desire to control the heavens... And I'm no exception.

dialogue_lines.title: Talent
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You won't get away!

dialogue_lines.title: Downed
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I was... just getting... started...

dialogue_lines.title: Return to Battle
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Did you miss me?

dialogue_lines.title: Health Recovery
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Much obliged.

dialogue_lines.title: Technique
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Burn away.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Won
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: One step closer to the stars.

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: This is also the reward of trailblazing.

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Oh, how nice.

dialogue_lines.title: Precious Treasure Opening
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: What a pleasant surprise.

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Sometimes you gotta do things yourself.

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: No help required.

dialogue_lines.title: Enemy Target Found
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Practice target?

dialogue_lines.title: Returning to Town
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Fancy a coffee?

story.1: An adventurous scientist who encountered the Astral Express as a young woman when it got stranded in her homeworld.\nYears later, when Himeko finally repaired the Express and began her journey into the stars, she realized that this is only the beginning. On her journey to trailblaze new worlds, she would need many more companions...\nAnd while they may have different destinations, they all gaze at the same starry sky.
story.2:
The girl is lost.

She can't remember when she became lost. She just walked and walked, on and on into the dark night, chasing the sun and the moon, over and over again — until she falls.

She remembers what she looked like as a college freshman, remembers her chosen major — interstellar travel dynamics — and now she's lying face down in the mud.

She looks up to the stars, and just then sees meteors streaming down: one, two, three... And then more, smaller ones, flickering and flashing ever so finely before a magnificent blaze tore open the night.

Her limbs drag her forward, leading her on to where the land meets the ocean. At the shoreline, the waters jostle against her like how the tide treats that stranded Express, alone and lost.

She walks in and see the scenery outside beginning to change. The Express shows her a myriad of magnificent worlds. They are faraway, beyond her homeworld, yet also close enough to be a simple train ride.

She tries to repair the Express. It starts up only briefly, but it is enough to skid across the sky of her home. She immediately sees the path home. From that altitude, the journey is so short, and even the ocean of her homeworld appears so insignificant.

It asked her whether she'd like to travel together. She wonders what kind of journey that would be.

"A journey to the beginning."
"Let's go then." Without hesitation, the girl replied, "Just as you brought me home, so would I take you home, too."
story.3:
Himeko has a suitcase.

This suitcase is her treasure trove. Previously, she'd filled it with all kinds of train repair tools to fix up the Express. But now, it's packed with a molecular saw, an escaped satellite, and countless other contraptions — the embodiment of her whims and the proof of her resolute will.

No travel companion is more faithful to her than this suitcase. Passengers come and go on the Express, and perhaps not even "the conductor" would be able to accompany her and the Express from start to finish.

But she doesn't care. She didn't care when that pretentious blond man left without saying goodbye, just like how she didn't care about her distant homeworld and old friends.

She knows that this journey is lonely. Even if she could get to know like-minded travel companions, even if they showed her generous grace, even if she could witness the end of a complete journey with those companions — that's all just a momentary fluke.

She knows that this journey is lonely. Nobody can follow in the exact same footsteps as anyone else. Nobody can experience for someone else everything that happens along a journey. All she can rely on are her own two eyes and feet.

That's why she stores inside her suitcase all the sights her eyes have witnessed, and all the footprints her feet have left behind.
story.4:
Himeko's memory is very good.

The longer the journey gets, the more travel companions she accrues. She can still remember many of them.

She remembers her awkward chit-chats with Pom-Pom, and how the first two passengers aboard the Express were Welt and his blond friend. She remembers how the taciturn Dan Heng defeated the monsters that can swallow stars with just one strike of his lance. She remembers how March 7th had awoken from her icy slumber, all the outfits she'd designed for March, and what March loves the most. She remembers how the Crew arrived at Herta Space Station, how she met {NICKNAME}, and how they'd embarked on a new journey once more.

She remembers the specifications for every single component of the Express and how they're assembled. She remembers when to oil the Express' bearings and when each plant on the Express needs watering. She remembers Pom-Pom's non-negotiable bottom line, and that Welt has rather juvenile hobbies. She remembers that Dan Heng is always pulling all-nighters to organize the data bank, and how March 7th loves to sleep in. She remembers the personality, habits, hobbies, birthdays, and other anniversary days of everyone aboard the Express. And she remembers much, much more.

The greatest pleasure for Himeko is that everyone can safely reach their destination on the Express.

"Traveling always has an end point. When it happens, I'll smile and say goodbye to everyone."

She always says that, and she'll definitely remember to do that.

It's memory that has formed the road she came from, and memory that will eventually return her to the seas from whence she came.
story.5:
"What a long journey." She says.

"I've been waiting for so, so long."████ looks at her: "It wasn't bad luck that has led you down this path, but wanderlust and curiosity."

"Of course," she smiles, "But I've experienced far less than what you've been through."

"No, I've never experienced the things you have." ████ shakes their head: "There are as many routes as there are pairs of feet."

"Right now, we may be standing in the same place, but we harbor different thoughts and views."

Together, they look up to the stars in silence, and just then saw meteors streaming down: one, two, three... And then more, smaller ones, flickering and flashing ever so finely before a magnificent blaze tore open the night.

A quiet voice disturbs the still air once more: "What do you see?"

"The stars have finished their journey." She says.

████ laughs: "I, instead, see that their journey is only just beginning."

They do not speak again.

"Let's go back. They're waiting for me."

████ is silent, then asks: "Has the journey so far made you happy?"

She picks up her suitcase and walks back in the direction of the Express without looking back.

"Same as always."

1.SkillDesc: When an enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, Himeko gains 1 point of Charge (max 3 points).\nIf Himeko is fully Charged when an ally performs an attack, Himeko immediately performs 1 follow-up attack and deals Fire DMG equal to 70% of her ATK to all enemies, consuming all Charge points.\nAt the start of the battle, Himeko gains 1 point of Charge.
1.SimpleSkillDesc: Gains a Charge stack when an enemy's Weakness is Broken.\nAfter an ally performs an attack, if fully Charged, immediately performs a follow-up attack and deal Fire DMG to all enemies, consuming all Charge stacks.\nGains 1 Charge stack at the start of each battle.

1.SkillDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
1.SimpleSkillDesc: N/A

1.SkillDesc: After using Technique, creates a dimension that lasts for 15 second(s). After entering battle with enemies in the dimension, there is a 1% base chance to increase Fire DMG taken by enemies by 10% for 2 turn(s). Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.
1.SimpleSkillDesc: Creates a dimension. After entering combat with enemies in the dimension, there is a high chance to increase Fire DMG taken by enemies.

dialogue_lines.title: First Meeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hi, I'm Welt Yang. If there's something you need help with, you can come find me anytime.

dialogue_lines.title: Greeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hm? Still half asleep? Don't force yourself. You should get some more rest.

dialogue_lines.title: Parting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Can't sleep? I understand — inspiration always comes knocking in the small hours. It's hard to ignore, right?

dialogue_lines.title: About Self: Previous Profession
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I was an animator for eight years — my life was pretty routine. I guess it was a little dull compared with adventuring, but work is a very worthwhile thing. It brings dreams to life.

dialogue_lines.title: About Self: Reason for Boarding the Express
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: *sigh* It's a long story, and it involves a lot of people and incidents that everyone would like to forget about, haha. Best not to talk about it. In essence, I got lost in the universe, but was fortunate enough to come across Himeko driving the Express.

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Arahato
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Oh, there's a lot to say there. They only aired that series on my home world — I don't know if there's anywhere else in the universe that'd have it... I can use my mimicry power to show you a few episodes, but I can't guarantee the resolution.

dialogue_lines.title: Hobbies
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Researching history and producing animations... I'd say they go hand in hand.

dialogue_lines.title: Annoyances
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Y'know {NICKNAME}, you remind me of the main character in a cartoon or something — you seem to attract companions out of thin air... *sigh* I hope you don't mind me saying that. It's just... it seems like my own chances of going on an adventure have plummeted again...

dialogue_lines.title: Something to Share
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: My home was corroded by a force known as Honkai, but that hasn't stopped it from being a warm and beautiful world.

dialogue_lines.title: Knowledge
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Do you know how the followers of Qlipoth the Preservation became the Interastral Peace Corporation? The Aeon wanted to build a wall, and humanity started searching for building materials so they could follow in Qlipoth's footsteps... it's pretty funny when you think about it.

dialogue_lines.title: About March 7th
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: March is curious about everything, and she's always getting me to do combat poses. She thinks I pull them off pretty well, apparently. You think so too? Hmm...

dialogue_lines.title: About Dan Heng
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: He's safe. I know he has his doubts... but he's one of the crew now. Himeko and I won't let anyone harm him.

dialogue_lines.title: About Himeko
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Himeko's the kind of person that... gives off her own light. Even though we're traveling across the train's old route, you can see Himeko's dreams flashing before her eyes when you look at her. It's almost as if she's been on the train from the very beginning — always moving starward.

dialogue_lines.title: About Pom-Pom
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Pom-Pom's always there to lend a helping hand, but I'd refrain from teasing them if I were you. The last person that did that...

dialogue_lines.title: About Dan Heng 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: There is a quote I like very much that I would like to share with him: "The cosmos is vast beyond compare, containing an infinite number of possibilities. An individual's fate shouldn't be limited to a single path ordained by heaven."

dialogue_lines.title: Eidolon Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: New adventures, new friends... Great, isn't it?

dialogue_lines.title: Character Ascension
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The passion of yesteryear isn't all that returned...

dialogue_lines.title: Max Level Reached
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: In the immense sea of stars, we too will leave our mark.

dialogue_lines.title: Trace Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: After spending so much time with everyone, I feel like I'm starting to age backwards.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With {NICKNAME}
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: As the protagonist of your own story, it's up to you to overcome and forge ahead.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Himeko
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I don't often get the chance to fight alongside you, Himeko. It's time to show everyone what we can do.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Dan Heng
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Having you here gives me peace of mind, Dan Heng. Still, best not to push yourself too hard.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Having you here gives me peace of mind, Dan Heng. Still... I'll stop nagging.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With March 7th
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Youthful energy is a good thing... but I'd appreciate a heads-up before you make any moves, March.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Seems you need to experience some hardship.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Stay calm.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Leave the rest to me.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You can still walk away.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Idling
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Better make a choice.

dialogue_lines.title: Basic ATK
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Stand down.

dialogue_lines.title: Skill 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Calm your body and mind.

dialogue_lines.title: Skill 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I won't go easy on you!

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Light Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'm fine.

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: That won't stop me...

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Activate
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You know nothing of the weight behind this power.

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Unleash
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Witness the stars shatter before you... Survive or be destroyed, there is no other choice.

dialogue_lines.title: Downed
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'll leave the rest... to you...

dialogue_lines.title: Return to Battle
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I can't relax just yet.

dialogue_lines.title: Health Recovery
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Timely treatment.

dialogue_lines.title: Technique
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Stay.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Won
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The galaxy is vast beyond compare.

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Interesting.

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: This will definitely come in handy.

dialogue_lines.title: Precious Treasure Opening
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You don't see these every day...

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Well figured out.

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Now, that's talent.

dialogue_lines.title: Enemy Target Found
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Enemy ahead... No harm in trying.

dialogue_lines.title: Returning to Town
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The next destination...? Up to you.

story.1: The wise and experienced former Anti-Entropy Sovereign who inherited the name of the world — Welt. He has saved Earth from annihilation time and time again.\nAfter the incident with St. Fountain came to a close, Welt had no choice but to venture with the initiator of the incident to the other side of the portal.\nPerhaps even he did not expect the new journey nor companions that awaited him there.
story.2:
On the way to the portal, Welt took out a pen and started outlining a sketch. For the eight years prior to that moment, he'd been repeating this job.

Going back further in time, he would construct objects in a different way, as long as the images could be pictured in his mind. But he could never regard that as "creation," because they were just the way the original is. Those had nothing to do with his mind.

This is just the duty of the man who inherited the name of the world. If the world needs him to save it, then he will become that hero without hesitation. He has fallen down many times and been mocked even more, but he will always stand before everyone either in the past or the future — he will never change.

Only now, he finds himself embarking on a new journey.
story.3:
When Welt returned to that dangerous cosmic battlefield, he could feel his blood start to boil once more.

Even when his spaceship lost power and was drifting aimlessly through space, he joked casually with his companion: "The end of one adventure is often the beginning of another."

When a passing-by Himeko managed to save them and informed them that they couldn't go back home, he kept up his jokes: "This is like something out of a cartoon, and it's far too coincidental to be real."

Life really is this coincidental.

Since he can't find his way back home and can't live out a peaceful existence for the time being, why doesn't he take up arms again and fight?

This time, there is no burden or destiny to bear. Everything shall obey his own will.
story.4:
These days, Welt rarely fights, and it remains unknown whether or not he retains the strength from his heyday. Gravity manipulation has remained his usual combat means, ever since his cane was transformed from the Star of Eden.

He suppresses his enemies with gravity, even creating a kind of mini-black hole — what he considered his everyday powers are met with amazement by the youngsters on the Express.

"Mr. Yang's incredible, amazing!"
"If you need help with anything, {NICKNAME}, go ask Mr. Yang."
"You need to take turns. Let him rest a little while..."

He is shocked to realize that his carelessness and surety are the results of his countless experiences, marks of the relentless passage of time he had endured. However, the youths aboard the Express are like blank pieces of paper, writing out their own lives.

What kind of responsibilities should he take on in their lives?

He couldn't help but think of the names of people throughout his life who had helped him before.
story.5:
— Welt's Log ██/██/████.

███'s relationship with the protagonists:

█—███'s sparkling personality is just like the protagonist in a cartoon. Go for it!
███ — A lively youth. I hope she can keep being imaginative, and not feel guilty even if she stumbles. Youths are always going to make mistakes, and ███ will be able to support her.
██ — A reliable youth. There's no need to worry about him. I hope he can chat more with ███, but if he doesn't want to, then that's fine.
██ — I can trust this companion with my life, ███ believes she will make the right decision.
██ — A common character in cartoons. Seemingly just a normal creature, but actually possesses frighteningly powerful abilities and a complicated background.

Note: If I ever get back home, consider making a cartoon out of this.

1.SkillDesc: After using Welt's Technique, create a dimension that lasts for 15 second(s). Enemies in this dimension have their Movement SPD reduced by 50%. After entering battle with enemies in the dimension, there is a 1% base chance to Imprison the enemies for 1 turn.\nImprisoned enemies have their actions delayed by 20% and SPD reduced by 10%. Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.
1.SimpleSkillDesc: Creates a dimension. Enemies in this dimension have their Movement SPD reduced. After entering combat with enemies in the dimension, there is a high chance for the enemies to become Imprisoned.

dialogue_lines.title: First Meeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hi, Astral Expressers... Well, you caught me.

dialogue_lines.title: Greeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: All space and time are practically infinite, and yet right here, right now, we find ourselves together. That's the nature of "destiny" — it creates a miracle but convinces you of an accident.

dialogue_lines.title: Parting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Oh, bye-bye, {NICKNAME}. See if you can surprise me next time.

dialogue_lines.title: About Self
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Before I joined the Stellaron Hunters, the nature of my work meant that I barely ever saw the same person twice.

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Fear
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Elio said that I'm good at creating "fear," even though I don't know what it is.

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Violin
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Playing the violin and firing a gun both require flexible fingers, but bullets are more obedient.

dialogue_lines.title: Hobbies
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I especially love velvet coats, they're so fragile and beautiful. Difficult to maintain — you only have to be a tiny bit careless to ruin the sheen.

dialogue_lines.title: Annoyances
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The past and the future are so similar to each other. I'm indifferent towards them.

dialogue_lines.title: Something to Share
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: There's a planet I go to every summer to look at the sea. That's when the tides are fiercest — you have to stand far away on the shore. Then, one year, they constructed a long observation pier. I haven't been back since.

dialogue_lines.title: Knowledge
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: My home world is one of many planets changed by a Stellaron... *sigh* It's a shame I never got to witness how far it fell at the time.

dialogue_lines.title: About Silver Wolf
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I like chatting with Silver Wolf. She's got a lot of ideas for someone so small.

dialogue_lines.title: About Blade
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Bladie... He takes after his name — his fights are a pleasure to witness.

dialogue_lines.title: Eidolon Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: No one can completely grasp another's thoughts... Not even you or I.

dialogue_lines.title: Character Ascension
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: If destiny can't propel me forward, I'll be the one to push destiny.

dialogue_lines.title: Max Level Reached
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: It's tough to get going again once you've stopped, don't you think?

dialogue_lines.title: Trace Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The path to the future begins right here.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With {NICKNAME}
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: {NICKNAME}, we meet again.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Silver Wolf
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Let's skip the formalities, Silver Wolf. I'm always game for putting on a show.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Blade
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The hunt beckons, Bladie. Are you ready?

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Himeko
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Oh, the Express Crew. Looks like we'll be joining forces quite often, huh?

dialogue_lines.title: About Sam
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Oh, Sam isn't nearly as picky about his prey as I am... you might consider it a lucky break running into me.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Caught in the net.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Just in time.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: May as well kill them all~

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: That breathing sensation? Remember it.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Idling
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Time to move.

dialogue_lines.title: Basic ATK
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: This won't take long.

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Light Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Didn't hurt.

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Not bad.

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Activate
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Good times never last.

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Unleash
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Time to say bye. BOOM.

dialogue_lines.title: Talent 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Relax.

dialogue_lines.title: Talent 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Stand still.

dialogue_lines.title: Downed
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: This... isn't the end.

dialogue_lines.title: Return to Battle
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Oh! I'm still alive.

dialogue_lines.title: Health Recovery
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Thanks. You're too good to me.

dialogue_lines.title: Technique
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Does that hurt?

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Won
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The human body is beautiful in its fragility.

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hmm. We can use it.

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: No surprise there.

dialogue_lines.title: Precious Treasure Opening
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Like what you see? Me too.

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Nice work.

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Impressive. Want a prize?

dialogue_lines.title: Enemy Target Found
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Huh, they don't look happy to see us...

dialogue_lines.title: Returning to Town
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: *sigh* Is that a stain? I like this coat.

story.1: On the Interastral Peace Corporation's wanted list, Kafka's record only shows her name and a note about her "interest in collecting coats." Little is known about this Stellaron Hunter aside from her being one of "Destiny's Slave" Elio's most trusted members. In order to achieve Elio's envisioned future, Kafka gets to work.
story.2: "Kafka, female human. Hails from New Babylon of Pteruges-V. Core member of the Stellaron Hunters, the next-in-command of 'Destiny's Slave.' Responsible for the following infractions: The Pier Point Incursion, two counts; The Pier Point Heist; The Trovys Disappearance; The Stellaron events of Jemorse, Bayjhana, Shilla-39C, Ulmora, 7-Midville, Loar-51, and Dro'a; Cyber attacks against Pier Point, four counts; Cyber attacks against Planet Screwllum; Cyber attacks against Herta Space Station; The Jepella Rebellion. Suspected to be related to the following infractions: The Stellaron events of Sich-Lala, Inupeis, Oun-G7, Zukov, Lidovia, Illily, Attouine, Buhayama.\nWanted Level: Highest. Dead or alive."\n— Wanted Order by the Interastral Peace Corporation
story.3: "...Due to the investigation's needs, the suspect's basic information is published as follows: Suspect Kafka (Wanted Serial No.: L933012000020002010004), female, outworld individual, age unknown; height about 170 centimeters, average body size. She had been spotted draped with a black jacket and wearing a white collared shirt inside, a pair of tight-fitting dark shorts, purple pantyhose, and a pair of sunglasses on her head.\nThe suspect has been reported to be connected to multiple non-natural disasters occurring on the Luofu in the recent past. She is currently at large, and is now publicly wanted on the Luofu. Any department and unit who detected said suspect are encouraged to contact the local Cloud Knights. At the same time, we encourage the suspect to turn herself in and to not take any chances."\n— Luofu Wanted Order (revoked)
story.4: "...This woman's name is Kafka, a new Hunter without any information on file, and belongs to no particular organization. She has an ability called Spirit Whisper that allows her to hypnotically manipulate others through language. Recently, she has appeared in Riverland, New Babylon. She was seen communicating with its overchief, Shilde, and absconded with him in witness of 143 people. She then made an appearance at a clothing store and stole a black jacket, two white shirts, and a red dress with 6 witnesses. After that, she was seen by 28 people at an old music record store where she purchased nothing. Before she emerged at the Riverland Guard Station to claim her rewards, she was spotted at the central park with 2695 citizens present. We want Kafka's head, as her lethal crimes cannot go unpunished."\n— Wanted Order by the Pteruges-V Devils
story.5: "...Go to Pteruges-V and locate an abandoned building at coordinates 135:7372124, 271:6372711. Enter it. There is an untouched canned drink under the window sill on the first floor. Take it. Wait until 11:12 AM on Wednesday and place the can at the entrance of the building. Kafka will appear 2 minutes later. There is a chance she will stop to investigate the can. Then, take the chance to throw this ball at her feet. I will take over and converse with her from there.\nThere is also a chance that Kafka will ignore the can. In that case, just throw the ball away. You will die, but death will come for everyone. As for the future that you yearn for - I will realize it."\n— Wanted Order by Destiny's Slave

1.SkillDesc: After an ally of Kafka's uses Basic ATK on an enemy target, Kafka immediately launches 1 follow-up attack and deals Lightning DMG equal to 42% of her ATK to that target, with a 1% base chance to inflict Shock equivalent to that applied by her Ultimate to the attacked enemy target, lasting for 2 turns. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per turn.

dialogue_lines.title: First Meeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hey, {NICKNAME}, you seem pretty cool. That Stellaron hasn't affected you at all?

dialogue_lines.title: Greeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You're online today too?

dialogue_lines.title: Parting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Done everything you needed to? Good, don't want to climb into bed only to realize you forgot to finish your dailies. Bye-bye.

dialogue_lines.title: About Self: Name
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: It's the same as my screen name. Isn't yours, {NICKNAME}?

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Universe
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: *sigh* I wish this universe had a few more things to do. Don't you get bored running across the map every day?

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Prometheus
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Prometheus is equipped with four modules — "friend" is the most talkative... "Friends are fated — a toast to our friendship!"

dialogue_lines.title: Hobbies
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Burying my head under a pillow for a siesta, and pinching cute things.

dialogue_lines.title: Annoyances
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Nobody gets to open an alt account, not even Elio.

dialogue_lines.title: Something to Share
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: When I hacked into the space station, I thought I may as well make some changes to Screwllum's portrait... but I changed it back in the end.

dialogue_lines.title: Knowledge
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: My favorite games always update on the same day. Do you think it's deliberate?

dialogue_lines.title: About Kafka
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ignoring the rules is something Kafka and I have in common.

dialogue_lines.title: About Blade
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: He said he'd game with me once his hand healed up, but it seems like it still isn't any better.

dialogue_lines.title: About Screwllum
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: It is always me that has to make the first move... That guy never loses his cool, does he?
dialogue_lines.UnlockDesc: Unlocked after completing the Companion Mission "Punklorde Mentality"

dialogue_lines.title: Eidolon Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Could've done it using console commands.

dialogue_lines.title: Character Ascension
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Gaming is a full-time pursuit.

dialogue_lines.title: Max Level Reached
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Maxed out? Time for the endgame.

dialogue_lines.title: Trace Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Stop worrying about the stats — have some fun!

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Kafka
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hey Kafka, can I go off-script this time?

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Blade
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: ...You gonna say something? Chat's enabled, y'know.

dialogue_lines.title: About Sam
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Doing a mission with Sam is basically: Bang, bang...! Bang! And then it's over.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You took the bait just like that?

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Might be trickier to crack.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Can you let me have some fun this time?

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Huh, more enemies.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Idling
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: ...I've got a raid to get to — let's finish this.

dialogue_lines.title: Skill
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Time for a buzz.

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Light Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Huh?

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Bad news.

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Activate
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: This combat needs optimizing.

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Unleash
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hmph, at this speed? Too slow!

dialogue_lines.title: Return to Battle
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Nice. Rematch.

dialogue_lines.title: Health Recovery
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Good as new.

dialogue_lines.title: Technique
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: 100% Break.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Won
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Nice, let's do it again when you're leveled up.

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Is that it? *sigh* Stingy chest.

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Wow, what an amazingly ordinary find!

dialogue_lines.title: Precious Treasure Opening
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: That's more like it.

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Is it always the same mechanics?

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hm, not a bad time.

dialogue_lines.title: Enemy Target Found
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ready when you are.

dialogue_lines.title: Returning to Town
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Time to log off... I mean, ah, head back.

story.1: The universe is just another game to this super hacker.\nNo matter how thorny the defense system, Silver Wolf can crack it with ease. Her hacking battle with Screwllum of the Genius Society has become stuff of legends in the hacking world.\nHow many more levels are there to beat in the universe? Silver Wolf looks forward to finding out.
story.2:
She toyed with the joystick, day in, day out.
A fast food restaurant with only one employee, a basement turned into an arcade hall, several old arcade machines — this was her childhood.

She didn't have a legal name or an identity number, only a nickname the proprietress chose for her.
She did not have any friends, but she is not lonely.
She liked the game of Pong — two lines and a dot of light, the simplest of ball games. She could play it for a whole day.
She liked Battle Wheel 32 — eight blocks of different colors on a matrix-drawn sky. There was only one rule: Win, no matter what.
She liked Geometric Wars, Odysseus, and Star Cheetah. The score records on these games were filled with astronomical numbers left by other patrons.

She toyed with the joystick, day in, day out.
Until one day, only one name remained on all of the score records.

She set down the joystick and looked around the empty basement.
Many people have sought respite in this place, but few stayed behind.
Many have left, but few returned.
She blinked and turned off the screen.

That night, the only employee of the fast food restaurant said goodbye to proprietress, and became the next person to leave.
The game called Basement ended that night.
story.3:
She traveled west through the barren land, arriving at Mount Scrap.
She wants to find a job, but was obstructed by her tendency to be a loner.
On Punklorde, almost everyone works in teams. Loners usually don't last long.

Acquiescing to her situation, she fabricated some virtual partners.
Her first one was called Friend. Of course it was.
Her second was Demon Lord, inspired by a poster she saw on the streets. In her imagination, it was a veteran who had lost the ability to speak.
She suddenly thought this team was too harmonious and lacked realism, so she named the third one Whitecollar and the fourth Servant.
Her final one was called Preschool Classmate — there wasn't a special meaning attached to this. She just really ran out of ideas. After much deliberation, she deleted this last person from her list.
She stored her "partners" in an intelligent weapon, so she could pompously introduce her sizable team to intermediaries.

She got her first job — its risk was as unimaginable as its reward.
Maybe she sold herself too well that people believed her, or they just wanted to see this newbie's performance, dead or alive.

On Punklorde, almost everyone works in teams. Loners usually don't last long.
Those who could last would eventually become legends.

After 24 system hours, she walked out of the Slag Gang's base — alone and through the front gate.
The intermediary was silent. They looked at her, then at the sky, before turning around to toss a chest full of gold ingots on the ground.
The game called Mount Scrap ended that day.
story.4:
She stood at the top of the tallest building in the Rainbow City, from which she could see her birthplace.
A fast food restaurant with only one employee, a basement turned into an arcade hall, several old arcade machines — this was her childhood.

She remembered liking the game of Pong — two lines and a dot of light, the simplest of ball games. She could play it for a whole day.
Just like how right now the crimson lights of the hoard of drones filled the night sky in crisscrossed line. Wave by wave they swarmed her, and wave by wave they fell.

She remembered liking Battle Wheel 32 — eight blocks of different colors on a matrix-drawn sky. There was only one rule: Win, no matter what.
Just like how right now distinct colors split the internet into eight regions, and people from all kinds of organizations gather in the square for a singular goal — to capture Silver Wolf, no matter the cost.

She remembered liking Geometric Wars, liking Odysseus, liking Star Cheetah. The score records on these games were filled with insurmountable, astronomical numbers.
Just like how right now— Wait, no, only this is somewhat different...
"Insurmountable." Hah, what's that?

She stood at the top of the tallest building in the Rainbow City, from which she could see her birthplace.
She has climbed too high for another person to stand beside her.
However, she looked up even higher than before. She can see the starry skies within reach of her hands, but yet so impossibly far.

"So boring."
The game called Rainbow City ended that day.
story.5:
She stood on a chair and dusted the screen of the arcade machine in circular motions again and again, trying to wipe away each particle of dust on it.
She returned to that fast food restaurant, to that basement. She opened the door, and everything was where they used to be. The proprietress kept all the arrangements for her.

The soft pink light spilled on the screen like the neon lights in the city, reminding her of the starry skies she saw on that day.
She was not the first to reach the top of that building, and not the first to have gazed upon those starry expanses.
She knew the story of Zero, the greatest hacker and the most terrifying player in the era of Internet Wars. He caused the first global network paralysis just to summon the IPC's escort ship to his doorstep.
She thought of Sage, the creator of the aether editing technology, a weirdo who named himself after the dead. To leave the planet, he was willing to discard his physical flesh, raid into the Dark Zone, and become a wraith eternally wandering the Interastral Network.
She recalled Stoneblade, the pride of Mount Scrap. His tales of resisting the Oasis Zone were oft-told among families in the barren land. Some said he eventually left with the Galaxy Rangers, continuing his rebellious spark in the cosmos.
His lover, Twinsnake, a celebrity in the Oasis Zone. Her whereabouts were widely disputed, and all people knew was that their birth could not stop them from being together, but the cosmos eventually parted them.

On Punklorde, any hacker who can be called "legendary" has ended up with the same fate.
As the legend of the current era, she knew that she has already arrived at that threshold.

Clop, clop... She heard footfalls coming from above her, getting closer, closer...
One, two, three, four people.
A man, a woman, a metal humanoid, and...
She sat down, turned around, and looked around the empty basement one last time, before turning to the person at the door...

"I'll join."
The game called Punklorde ended that day.

1.SkillDesc:
There is a 75% base chance to add 1 Weakness of an on-field character's Type to the target enemy. This also reduces the enemy's DMG RES to that Weakness Type by 20% for 2 turn(s). If the enemy already has that Type Weakness, the effect of DMG RES reduction to that Weakness Type will not be triggered.
Each enemy can only have 1 Weakness implanted by Silver Wolf. When Silver Wolf implants another Weakness to the target, only the most recent implanted Weakness will be kept.
In addition, there is a 1% base chance to further reduce the All-Type RES of the enemy by 8% for 2 turn(s).
Deals Quantum DMG equal to 98% of Silver Wolf's ATK to this enemy.

dialogue_lines.title: First Meeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hello, {NICKNAME}. I'm Arlan, I head up the Security Department on Herta Space Station. I'll be in charge of your safety during your time here.

dialogue_lines.title: Greeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Seed Isle's latest flavors of dried earthworm hit the shelves today — we should head over before the queue starts. The early bird catches the... anyway.

dialogue_lines.title: Parting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You should have some mixed vegetable juice before bed — it helps you sleep. Well, I'm on night duty tonight. See you tomorrow.

dialogue_lines.title: About Self: Looking for Peppy
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: We've held the Space Station Peppy-Finding Contest nine times so far, and I've... I've won it nine times in a row.

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: On Patrol
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I try to be inconspicuous when I'm on patrol. That way, I can avoid disturbing the researchers while they work and observe their utmost concentration.

dialogue_lines.title: Hobbies
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You should keep your sword sharp at all times.

dialogue_lines.title: Annoyances
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Oh, man! The phone case shipping location is too far from the space station — you have to buy 5000 units for them to deliver... Wait, please don't tell Lady Asta that.

dialogue_lines.title: Something to Share
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: There are some sword fragments housed here on the space station, but I can't find them in the pictographic index... They must be pretty special.

dialogue_lines.title: Knowledge
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I heard the researchers say that there are some curios that actively requested to come to the space station.

dialogue_lines.title: About Asta
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: *sigh* ...I don't know why, but it seems like I manage to annoy Lady Asta fairly regularly.

dialogue_lines.title: About Herta
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'm different from the researchers — I'm not what you'd call a "follower" of Madam Herta — but she still lets me work here.

dialogue_lines.title: Eidolon Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I've found a home to protect.

dialogue_lines.title: Character Ascension
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I can't afford to be complacent.

dialogue_lines.title: Max Level Reached
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The fruits of my training. I'll keep it up.

dialogue_lines.title: Trace Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You can learn new things by going back to the basics.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With {NICKNAME}
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Combat is an unavoidable risk, but be careful.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Asta
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You should leave the fighting to me, Lady Asta.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Herta
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Madam Herta! A—Awaiting your orders!

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Your number is up.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Nothing can stop me.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Fight to win.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Haven't learned your lesson?

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Idling
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: We have to go on the offensive.

dialogue_lines.title: Skill 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: As you wish.

dialogue_lines.title: Skill 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Be silent.

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Light Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hmm?

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Barely felt it.

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Activate
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Is that all you got?

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Unleash
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Let me pay you back — tenfold!

dialogue_lines.title: Downed
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I can't protect you anymore...

dialogue_lines.title: Return to Battle
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You can't fight from the grave.

dialogue_lines.title: Health Recovery
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'm fine... thank you.

dialogue_lines.title: Technique
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You're in the way.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Won
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Even a little strength comes in useful.

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You keep it.

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I think I've seen these in our inventory...

dialogue_lines.title: Precious Treasure Opening
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Did we get it all?

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: That'll do it.

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Just like my days at the Security Department.

dialogue_lines.title: Enemy Target Found
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Look up ahead.

dialogue_lines.title: Returning to Town
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: If there's no danger here, then I'm needed elsewhere.

story.1: The inarticulate head of the Herta space station's Security Department.\nWhile scientific research is beyond his understanding, Arlan is willing to risk his life to protect the staff who value research so very much. He is used to pain and wears his scars like badges of honor.\nOnly when holding Peppy does the boy let down his guard and show a rare smile.
story.2:
How is Arlan's work in the Security Department?
— Brother Arlan is the beacon that guides the Security Department, the core support for everyone's battles! Without him, the space station would fall to pieces in a day. Without him, people's lives would be ruined in ten days. Without him, the station would be hellish in just one hundred days!
— But he plays holodisc with Peppy during work hours.
— Because he's finished all daily security tasks ahead of schedule! His mere presence is an inspiration to us all.
— But he plays holodisc with Peppy during work hours.
— How do you know that playing holodisc with Peppy isn't actually part of his job description...

"You're not allowed to play with your phone while out on patrol. Give it to me."
"No, brother Arlan! People are talking smack about you in the group chat! Don't you care?"
"Nope. Too busy."
"Huh, have you got an urgent mission? Let me go with you. What happened?"
"I'm taking Peppy to do rehab through play holodisc."
story.3:
There are countless strange and valuable things around Miss Asta's house, but it's the dog at death's door that attracts the most attention.

What's more, her forlorn cries only increase in volume as her parents attempt to comfort her — telling her that this dog she picked up won't live for very long, and they are better off buying her another one.

That filthy pup just lies there without the strength to even lift up its head and look around the people surround it. The crying, arguing, and the silence... None of this has anything to do with it.

At one point, he thinks it had already stopped breathing, so he bends down to check its nose. Just then, the dog suddenly licks his fingers — which is about the farthest distance it can stretch.

— Its tongue is wet.

"Wanna play holodisc?"

Its lifeless eyes suddenly light up.
story.4:
He stops pacing in the corridor and gazes out of the window into the tranquility of deep space, the dark circles around his eyes reflecting back at him.

Another pair of bloodshot eyes appears at the window. Their owner looks more relaxed than she usually does before the researchers, and absentmindedly lets out a huge yawn.

"You're up late. Not going to bed?"
"I'm feeling anxious, so I'm just out for a patrol..."
"I just updated the firmware for the defense shield, and security systems are all operating smoothly."
"Maybe I'm overthinking things, but..."
"I understand. You're the head of security, and I trust your instincts."

The space station remains brightly lit and operates without a stop. They each return to their respective posts.

They both know that regardless of the protection of Madam Herta's fame, the defensive measures around the space station, and the round-the-clock vigilance of the Security Department — if a disaster was to occur...

It would only take seconds.
story.5:
"Everyone's evacuated. Arlan. Hurry up!"
"There may still be survivors inside."
"No... There aren't any more life signs in there."

He thought he could trust Asta until the moment when countless Antimatter Legion pawns pour towards him like a tsunami. The signal from the watcher zone is faint. Asta won't be able to see this situation.

He is now standing, alone, in the elevator. He has to make a decision, even if he has to disobey Asta's orders — No matter the cost, he has to block access to the elevator to save everyone. He cannot allow these monsters to get to the master control zone.

"Sorry, Miss Asta..."

The Antimatter Legion strikes him down from behind before he can explain himself. He falls, and his remote communications disconnects.

He had never hesitated, whether working in Miss Asta's home or after becoming Herta Space Station's head of Security Department. He had always taken for granted that, since Miss Asta decided to head in one direction, he has to follow her.

Arlan raises his head with great difficulty, and the monsters move closer to him. He had never disobeyed an order from Miss Asta before. This is the first time.

"Hopefully it won't be the last time."

This thought pops up in his head.

Propping himself up with his greatsword, he slowly and firmly stands up.
