dialogue_lines.title: First Meeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hi, {NICKNAME}! The name's Asta, I'm the lead researcher on Herta Space Station. I'll be sure to let you know if I need your help... Don't worry, I think you'll be hearing from me.

dialogue_lines.title: Greeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: *yawn* You're here! The observation matrix we adjusted should have some results for us now. Free to take a look?

dialogue_lines.title: Parting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Is that the time? Time flies when you're working hard.

dialogue_lines.title: About Self: Family
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: *sigh* Even if I never kept in touch with any of my relatives, they would find their way over here.

dialogue_lines.title: About Self: Work
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You heard right! If I don't work hard, I'll have to go back and inherit the family fortune... *sigh*

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Astronomy Thesis
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: ...I haven't written a single word yet... But it won't take long once I get started!

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Space Station
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: "The space station is merely Herta's toy box." That's by no means an inaccurate statement. But this is Herta we're talking about — her toys are pretty dangerous~

dialogue_lines.title: Hobbies
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Continuously channeling funds into constructing the space station, improving employee benefits, creating a positive feedback loop... Ahem, as well as satisfying the lead researcher's — that is to say my — indispensable shopping needs.

dialogue_lines.title: Annoyances
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: If only Madam Herta could pay a visit to the space station more often — the researchers are clearly her followers.

dialogue_lines.title: Something to Share
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: When I first got to the space station, the researchers had prepared a room for me. I—I was really grateful, but it was far away from everyone else. That was a bit disheartening.

dialogue_lines.title: Knowledge
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Even the monitoring room is being monitored.

dialogue_lines.title: About Arlan
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Arlan's always saying stuff like, "all of you must heed Lead Researcher Asta's judgment!" Then when I remind him that that includes him, he says, "don't worry, I have my own judgment."

dialogue_lines.title: About Herta
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: If there's anyone who thinks they can be as headstrong as Madam Herta, I'd recommend they consider whether or not they possess her intelligence first.

dialogue_lines.title: About the Astral Express
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I can't solve every problem the Express Crew might have in their voyage across the galaxy, but if money's ever the solution, come find me.
dialogue_lines.UnlockDesc: Unlocked after completing Companion Mission "You Already Know Me"

dialogue_lines.title: About Topaz
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The last time I spoke with Topaz, we agreed to take a holiday. We were going to charter a ship, go star-seeing, and catch up on all the IPC gossip... but we still haven't had the chance...

dialogue_lines.title: About Ruan Mei
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I asked Miss Ruan Mei where I could buy a charm like the one on her sleeve — but I was surprised to learn she'd hand-embroidered it. I was equally surprised when she gave me my own hand-embroidered charm the next time she came to the space station. Her craftsmanship, like her research papers, is superb.

dialogue_lines.title: Eidolon Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Every star is a miracle!

dialogue_lines.title: Character Ascension
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The more I learn about it, the more I love the starry sky.

dialogue_lines.title: Max Level Reached
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Goals are like the stars — we'll reach them eventually.

dialogue_lines.title: Trace Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Another step closer to distant worlds.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With {NICKNAME}
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The Express has been a lifeline — time to return the favor!

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Arlan
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Arlan... don't carry the weight alone.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Herta
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Oh! Madam Herta? We've got nothing to worry about.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Topaz
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Topaz, what a coincidence! Guess I should see this as a business trip!

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hm. Scared yet?

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Time to get vigilant.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: A guest with no manners, huh?

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I don't remember inviting you.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Idling
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Guess what I'm about to do~

dialogue_lines.title: Basic ATK
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Look out~

dialogue_lines.title: Skill 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Who's the lucky one today?

dialogue_lines.title: Skill 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: A gift from the stars~

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Light Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ow ow ow...

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: No, don't...

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Activate
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Everything is ordained by the stars.

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Unleash
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Oh profound secrets of the stars, give these Trailblazers your blessing!

dialogue_lines.title: Downed
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: But I want... to know more...

dialogue_lines.title: Return to Battle
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: That didn't count, let's go again!

dialogue_lines.title: Health Recovery
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Saving me won't earn you any favors.

dialogue_lines.title: Technique
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Found your weakness~

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Won
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The stars will always remember us.

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Do I have this already?

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hope you like them!

dialogue_lines.title: Precious Treasure Opening
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Definitely worth our while.

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Progress~

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Been a while since I worked on one of these!

dialogue_lines.title: Enemy Target Found
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Might as well beat it up before it attacks me.

dialogue_lines.title: Returning to Town
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Can you see the stars from here too?

story.1: A fiercely inquisitive and energetic young girl. She is the Lead Researcher of the space station Herta.\nWhether it is managing opinionated staff, or courteously but firmly responding to the Intelligentsia Guild's devious demands, Asta handles it all effortlessly.\nAfter all... commanding a space station is much easier than taking over the family business!
story.2:
Back when she was still a child but was already picking out her own telescopes, Asta would always hear the faint murmurings of elders praising her. She was quite proud of this, because she could discern the quality of a telescope's primary mirror and autoguider with a mere glance.

It wasn't until she drew within earshot one day that she learned they were actually tutting and tsking at her — how could such a little girl manage to pick out such expensive items?

Personal hobbies don't exist in the eyes of these people. All they chose to see is a pampered little princess.

"You like stars? Oh, I get it. You're a little girl. You all like sparkly things."
"Yes... I'm researching protostars at the moment. I hope to name the stars I discover after myself... Just like those famous astronomers of old."
"Is that all? Shall we name this planet after you for your next birthday? How about two planets? Those are actually quite cheap."
"..."
"Hey, where are you going, Asta? Asta!!!"
story.3:
She knows that it doesn't matter whether she and her mother are reliable volunteers. People just want to see them here. That's all.

After apportioning the food, the people disperse one by one, leaving behind a little boy. His right hand is wounded, and his eyes are like that of a wolf as he stares at her in a way she doesn't like.

"Are you going to ask me to borrow money?"
"I don't want any money. I have to pay back the cost of this meal, but I don't have any money on me."

Occasionally, "friends" she never recognizes would come and ask if they could borrow money from Asta. However, it's the first time she actually heard someone offer to pay her back. Her eyes widen in surprise. Listening in, her mother can't help but laugh.

"You're still a kid. What kind of work can you do?"
"Fight."
"That's not a good job. How about this — I'll give you a job."

To this day, in Asta's heart, the bill for Arlan's meal was settled the moment he said that he'd pay her back.
story.4:
"The stars follow their own orbits, but what about humans... Can we humans ever hope to control our own destiny?"

A wealthy family background grants Asta the power to explore the stars, but also become her personal shackles.

As she grows older, Asta's vow to become an astronomer was viewed as increasingly radical by her family. She begins to lose count of how many times she'd argue during family meetings about this very thing.

Until one day, after a family meeting, a puppet girl walks in, And one of the family members who were so domineering a moment ago suddenly changes into a yes-man.

"That's the girl."
"But she'd..."
"No buts. I didn't come all this way to listen to your garbage academic reports. I'd rather listen to this girl debate with you."
"..."
"I want to see her on the space station within three days."

And with that, the puppet girl walks straight out without looking back.
story.5:
After becoming the Lead Researcher of the Herta space station, Asta's life is now busier than ever before. She has to manage the researchers and their differing opinions, reply to the numerous correspondence meant for Herta, constantly negotiate with the IPC, and procure equipment from various different sources... But at the same time, she's experiencing the greatest freedom she'd ever known...

"Deploy the Nyul Iman telescope in the second equipment bay. Set it to 100× astronomical units, and begin observation of the pre-stellar core in front of us."
"Pay close attention to particle density. If you discover any super-dense structures, commence recording of the protostar fragmentation process at once."

In her spare time, Asta would sometimes consider how Madam Herta never seems to come around anymore after Asta arrived at the space station. She even made inquiries, but was told, "If there's no interesting new stuff, I won't bother coming in."

"...I'd rather listen to this girl debate with you."

She thought back to the words Herta had casually told her family on that day long age.

The Herta of her memories seems to stand out amongst resplendent starlight, giving her the power to control the starry sky — and her own destiny.

15.SimpleSkillDesc: The character will receive 1 stack of Charging for every different enemy they hit, for a maximum of 5 stacks. Every stack of Charging increases ATK for all allies. At the beginning of their turn, reduce Charging stacks.

1.SimpleSkillDesc: N/A

dialogue_lines.title: First Meeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: This is Herta. I'm busy right now. This is my ranged puppet's automated-response mode: Hello everyone. Hope you have a wonderful day. Goodbye.

dialogue_lines.title: Greeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Why not come around today and help me with my research? You'll be the subject, by the way.

dialogue_lines.title: Parting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: *sigh* I've lost interest in your research potential for today. See you tomorrow.

dialogue_lines.title: About Self: Puppet
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: What do you make of it? It's about seventy percent similar to how I looked as a child.

dialogue_lines.title: About Self: True Form
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Best not to ponder, you'll be scratching your chin all day.

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Genius Society
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The good thing about this club is that it doesn't ask me for anything. In fact, it doesn't even care if I'm a member.

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Visiting an Aeon
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Why do I get to visit an Aeon? I'm Herta, that's why.

dialogue_lines.title: Hobbies
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: If you're not solving problems or writing up contributions, then don't blame me if your life is boring.

dialogue_lines.title: Annoyances
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'm perfect enough already. What else do I need to prove? Of course, I could write a few more books... but what would I get out of that? Why should I bother?

dialogue_lines.title: Something to Share
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The Intelligentsia Guild is always able to find a way to support their case, writing enough "scholarship" in one night to fill a library... This is a problem.

dialogue_lines.title: Knowledge
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The Lord of Silence erased the eyes from the portrait, but drew everyone's attention in the process.

dialogue_lines.title: About Arlan
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Asta provided financial assistance to a few exceptional children — I assume Arlan was one of them.

dialogue_lines.title: About Asta
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: If my other collections had people like Asta watching over them, I could take a hands-off approach.

dialogue_lines.title: About Himeko
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I give her the most boring things, and then she gives them back to me and they're suddenly interesting.

dialogue_lines.title: About Ruan Mei
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ruan Mei is a genius among geniuses — I won't deny that. I don't always get along with her, but I do admire her... Maybe the admiration is mutual.

dialogue_lines.title: Eidolon Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Define inspiration? Tsk, it's only the several thousand ideas racing through my mind every minute.

dialogue_lines.title: Character Ascension
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You call that a build update?

dialogue_lines.title: Max Level Reached
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Finally. Clocking off. Bye.

dialogue_lines.title: Trace Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Happy? Word of advice: Don't expect too much from a puppet.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With {NICKNAME}
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You better be good. My time is precious.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Arlan
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Why the long face? I'm not going to eat you.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Asta
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Asta! Here's the key. Gotta go now — bye.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Himeko
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You know the drill — send me all your new toys, and I'll return them later.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Ruan Mei
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I don't usually get to see you outside the Simulated Universe. Who do you want to experiment on this time?

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Oh, poor you...

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: And you're supposed to be stronger?

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: What are you looking at?

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You must be honored to meet me?

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Idling
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Idle mode... *yawn* How boring.

dialogue_lines.title: Basic ATK
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: This is gonna hurt.

dialogue_lines.title: Skill
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Maybe you can keep it down!?

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Light Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I won't break.

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'm breaking!

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Activate
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Do you know who I am?

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Unleash
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ever see a diamond this big? It's all yours~

dialogue_lines.title: Talent 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Time to twirl~

dialogue_lines.title: Talent 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Time to twirl!

dialogue_lines.title: Downed
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Connection... lost...

dialogue_lines.title: Return to Battle
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Rebooting...

dialogue_lines.title: Health Recovery
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: How appropriate.

dialogue_lines.title: Technique
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Upgrade configured.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Won
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: How am I gonna get that time back!

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: That's it?

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Meh, acceptable quality.

dialogue_lines.title: Precious Treasure Opening
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Awesome. Cool. Can we go now?

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: It took you that long?

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I can do this in my sleep.

dialogue_lines.title: Enemy Target Found
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Now, how should I dispose of you?

dialogue_lines.title: Returning to Town
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Is there anything interesting here? I doubt it.

story.1:
Herta space station's true master.
As the human with the highest IQ on the Blue, she only does what she's interested in, dropping projects the moment she loses interest — the best example being the space station.
She typically appears in the form of a remote-controlled puppet.
"It's about seventy percent similar to how I looked as a child." — Herta
story.2:
Madam Herta's manuscripts are extremely valuable assets.

Its core rarity is not in how Madam Herta rarely pens to paper, but because to a genius like her, nothing is ever worth recording.

Scientific research that would take normal researchers ten years — or even a lifetime — to achieve may be able to shed light on an entirely new domain of research, but they are to Herta as ordinary as turning on a LED light. Who would waste time trying to systematically record such trivial matters?

It's not just Madam Herta — any documentation written by a Genius Society member is a priceless treasure. However, Herta is more generous and more understanding toward normal people like us. She leaves her handwritten drafts behind in random places around the space station with as much generosity as she allows researchers to study the Curios she collected.

Of course, we all firmly understand that Madam Herta isn't being lazy and just discarding incomplete drafts around the place. It's so she can claim to investors with plausible deniability that "I've finished writing that paper, but can't find it anywhere."
story.3:
Everybody knows that qualifying as a researcher on the Herta space station is a cherished goal of the wider scientific community. Today, we're interviewing its owner, Madam Herta. First of all, can you please tell us what was your motivation for setting up a scientific research oasis like this?

"I have so much stuff, and nowhere to put it."

Ah, truly an unforeseen outcome! Even unintentional acts from the brilliant Madam Herta can benefit millions of ordinary people. However, evil will always strive in vain to destroy such a wondrous place. Madam Herta, what are your thoughts about the Antimatter Legion's last invasion?

"Don't come back."

Oh... such a severe warning. This must form an indispensable part of Madam Herta's illustrious achievements. The mere Antimatter Legion dares to invade this space station — but you don't even deserve Madam Herta's attention! Let's move on to the next question, then!
story.4:
Recent research progress on the space station has been hampered by the impact of the accident. Several researchers have been blaming themselves for betraying Madam Herta's trust and preference. May I ask: Do you have anything you'd like to say to everyone?

"Nope. Keep up the great work."

Everyone wishes to contribute to your scientific research, Madam Herta...

"No thanks."

Indeed, no researcher could ever hope to match Madam Herta's scientific ability, which is why we're deeply impressed by your wisdom and insights. Could you please tell us, Madam Herta, whether you have any research recommendations for everyone? We'd love to learn from you!

"No."

Madam Herta, your intellect and talents are obvious to all, but normal people like us could never hope to be like you... Could you please give us any pointers, such as in what domain we might devote our limited cognitive resources to?

"You should go home and sleep."
story.5:
Madam Herta, you are so considerate. Indeed, the research that Genius Society members conduct are so complex that ordinary people may not even be able to understand the papers' titles. So, let's talk about something else: The space station is filled with your loyal supporters. Everyone is curious about your personal situation. For example, the manuscript that you're writing — when are you planning on publishing the latest chapter?

"I don't think it really matters, but more importantly — Elias Salas once said that the most challenging thing of all is self-improvement. So, let's examine this question more carefully: When writing a paper, the key question is how to write that paper —"

Um... err... I see. But Madam Herta, we all love your book How I Joined the Genius Society...

"I don't think it really matters, but more importantly — Zandar once said that even those who have made it to the top still need to practice self-improvement. So, let's examine this question more carefully: When considering joining the Genius Society, the question is how does one go about joining the Genius Society —"

Are you in... auto-answering mode?

"I don't think it really matters, but more importantly — Yu Qingtu once said that being an academic is a matter of ambition. So, let's examine this question more carefully: When considering what is called auto-answering mode, the question is how to automate the answers —"

dialogue_lines.title: First Meeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: My name is Bronya Rand, heir to Belobog's supreme guardian and acting commander of the Silvermane... Apologies, I'm used to introducing myself like that — you can call me Bronya.

dialogue_lines.title: Greeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I had a nightmare last night... S—Sorry, I'm not fully awake yet.

dialogue_lines.title: Parting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'd like to walk around a bit more... Don't worry, I won't go far. See you tomorrow.

dialogue_lines.title: About Self
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Sometimes I feel like I don't represent myself... that I'm a symbol in human form, and anyone could have been given the title of "heir to the supreme guardian." I don't know where the feeling comes from, but I hope it doesn't become the truth.

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: The Architects
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The Architects built us a fortress to keep the blizzards at bay, but we must never forget that those blizzards are still on the horizon.

dialogue_lines.title: Hobbies
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The faint singing that emanates from Golden Theater, the sound of hurried footsteps in the early morning, the night-time tranquility of Qlipoth Fort... I know they might seem contradictory, but I like all of them.

dialogue_lines.title: Annoyances
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You have to suppress your anger during an interrogation, or you might find yourself using... indelicate vocabulary.

dialogue_lines.title: Something to Share
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: When you've been on the front line for a while, you start to get an overwhelming urge to return to the guardian's residence and rest. But then as soon as you're lying in bed, all your worries about the front line come to the fore... Perhaps that's the "responsibility" that mother used to talk about.

dialogue_lines.title: Knowledge
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I heard the Solwarm Festival was first established to celebrate the arrival of spring, but Belobog citizens these days just see it as a few days off... I want to bring the original meaning back again.

dialogue_lines.title: About Gepard
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Captain Gepard...? I think he could accurately be described as Belobog's iron wall. In this city, it's more difficult to defend than go on the offensive.

dialogue_lines.title: About Serval
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I remember I'd be there when mother and the rest of them would convene, and Serval would always patiently answer any questions I had... *sigh* I'm starting to feel like that was a long, long time ago.

dialogue_lines.title: About Pela
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Whenever I praise her, she does her utmost to keep a straight face and hide any trace of happiness she might be feeling... I can tell, because I've practiced the same thing.

dialogue_lines.title: About Cocolia
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I have deep respect for my mother, but she's no longer how I remember her. Perhaps I never realized who she truly was...

dialogue_lines.title: About Seele
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Our first encounter may have been a bit of a disaster, but it was also the start of a new future... Haha, if Seele heard this she'd probably say I was giving one of my Overworld princess speeches.
dialogue_lines.UnlockDesc: Unlocked after completing Trailblaze Mission "The Return."

dialogue_lines.title: About Lynx
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The third child of the Landau family, right? I've heard Gepard mention her before, but I've yet to meet her. From what I've heard, "Lynxy" — as they call her — is very smart for her age.

dialogue_lines.title: About Topaz
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'm sure Jarilo-VI won't be the only planet to have IPC visitors, but I bet not all of them will have a visitor like Topaz...
dialogue_lines.UnlockDesc: Unlocked after completing the Trailblaze Continuance "Future Market (II)."

dialogue_lines.title: Eidolon Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The future of Belobog shines bright.

dialogue_lines.title: Character Ascension
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Feeling good. I must stay focused.

dialogue_lines.title: Max Level Reached
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Thank you... I will stand firm for my people.

dialogue_lines.title: Trace Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: A brilliant strategy.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Seele
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: No showing off, Seele! Listen to my orders.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Pela
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'll be needing a combat report, Pela.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Gepard
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Bring us another victory, Captain.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With {NICKNAME}
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I appreciate the help of the Astral Express.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: There's always a weakness.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Powerful enemy, time to change tactics.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: This battle is unavoidable.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You'll pay for this.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Idling
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: A decisive moment in the battle.

dialogue_lines.title: Basic ATK
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Evildoer.

story.1: Heir to the Supreme Guardian of Belobog, she is the young and capable commander of the Silvermane Guards.\nBronya received a rigorous education from an early age, and as such, possesses the grace and affinity as expected of an heir.\nHowever, after witnessing the abysmal conditions in the Underworld, seeds of doubt begin growing in the mind of Belobog's future leader. "Can all the training I've received really help me lead the people to the lives they want?"
story.2:
She learned to hide her thoughts from an early age. Every day, she'd walk the same paths with the other kids, play the same games, and gossip about the same hobbies. But she never felt taken over by the trivial and bland nature of life — she'd sit on a gray stone bench every time she was alone, looking up at the sky and imagining a perfect and complete sky unobstructed by that flat disc.

She could see the laborers dripping with sweat as they toil, the pressure of survival crushing their passion for life. Seeing the tired but earnest look in their eyes, she slipped into a quagmire of confusion: Is life really destined to be like this? Just as the vastness of the sky was dissected by that monstrous steel disc, perhaps the freedom she yearned for was also destined to be incomplete.

She struggled to break free from this quagmire, silently recording the ideals that she'd come to implement in her life on that dusty stone road.

"Make the world a better place."
story.3:
Sitting on her mother's lap, cold arms wrapped around her neck, she felt an indescribable sense of security. Her mother's voice was gentle and deep as she told the girl an ancient folk tale — the ending of which is hardly satisfying, but nevertheless, the girl enjoyed it very much. Her mother knew what she liked, and those fairy tales with happy endings would just leave her feeling bored and arise far too many questions. Telling stories with bad endings is an excellent way to lure the girl into falling asleep at night.

"Mother... Why can't Lord Grey live a happy life like Catherine?"
"Do you want him to be happy, Bronya?"
"Lord Grey is a kind man. Kind people deserve to live a happy life."

The conversation stopped there, but she remembered her mother's gentle smile. Years later, when she recalled that warm afternoon at Qlipoth Fort, she felt that her mother's smile might have hidden a sliver of regret.
story.4:
From the moment she donned her Silvermane Guard armor, she was already prepared. But the first funeral she ever attended was still far more heavy than she could ever have imagined.

It was her first time leading a campaign. In the northern ruins, the Silvermane Guards and Fragmentum monsters engaged in brutal combat. She led a crack squad of about a dozen soldiers deep behind enemy lines, fighting bravely until they ran out of ammo and food. As they made their way to the evac point, the terrifying Fragmentum creatures ambushed her — but the fatal attack was blocked by a brave private at the cost of his life. She didn't even have the time to see the face of her savior.

The prolonged wail of the funeral horn rang out. The young captain saw her grief, and came to her side.

"The coffin's empty. I couldn't even manage to bring him back to Belobog..."
"Don't blame yourself, Miss Bronya. For you and the city... everyone here is willing to make the same sacrifice."
"...I really wish I could swap places with him."
"Learning to bear these heavy burdens is the only way to become a true leader."
story.5:
The woman paces back and forth in the room, and a door separates her from the throngs of people. She is already very familiar with giving this kind of speeches, but the anxiety of the wait never abated despite the refinement of her oratory skills. Thinking back on the promise she is about to make and the words of consolation she'd crafted, she sinks into a child-like state of confusion and disbelief during those brief minutes.

A sudden breeze stirs the stale air in the room, brushing through her long hair. She turns around to see a familiar figure walking toward her — with delicate, quiet steps like a kaleidoscope of butterflies fluttering through the lifeless hall.

"Over-thinking things again?"

The woman looking like a butterfly asks, with a teasing smile on her face. She replies with an exasperation grin.

"Same as always, you know — I'm nervous beforehand, but can play to my audience once on stage."
"Hey, don't screw this up. Those old fossils want to play politics, and they're just waiting for an opportunity for you to slip up."
"Haha... Then I'll have to ask you to keep an eye on them for me."
"Hey, looks like time is up."

The dull sound of gears gnashing and turning echoes in the hall. She cast one last look back at the person beside her — who retreats into the shadows with a nod and a trusting smile.

The door creaks open and a beam of warm light shot into the hall, lighting up her face. What follows are deafening applause and cheers.

"Let's go, Bronya."

dialogue_lines.title: First Meeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hey, I'm Seele. I'm a member of Wildfire down here in the Underworld. Wanna help me forge a future for the people?

dialogue_lines.title: Greeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Right on time — let's start the patrol.

dialogue_lines.title: Parting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hey, you're about to fall asleep on your feet. Don't push yourself — I got this. Go get some rest.

dialogue_lines.title: About Self: Childhood
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Me as a child? Hook times ten.

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Life Underground
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: We may live underground, but we won't be buried by this city.

dialogue_lines.title: Hobbies
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I like to keep my scythe sharp so I can get a good night's sleep on it.

dialogue_lines.title: Annoyances
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'm over it now, but... when I was young, I used to keep my favorite comic books in the clinic. Then the other kids started borrowing them... permanently.

dialogue_lines.title: Something to Share
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The chief's right — sometimes a sharp blade is the only way to get people to come to their senses.

dialogue_lines.title: Knowledge
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hmm... Can I see this Pom-Pom? Sounds like a talking teddy bear to me.

dialogue_lines.title: About Natasha
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I learned when I was a kid that temper tantrums won't get you anywhere with Nat... Let's just say she knew how to give you a taste of your own medicine.

dialogue_lines.title: About Clara
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: That girl doesn't talk much, but... I know she doesn't see us as her enemy.

dialogue_lines.title: About Svarog
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Heh, Svarog's always going on about "humanity's endless conflicts," but you don't get peace by offering everything up on a silver platter.

dialogue_lines.title: About Sampo
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: If you need something done, he might be your man. But if you feel like befriending him, do yourself a favor: don't.

dialogue_lines.title: About Hook
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Don't let her appetite for chaos fool you — I think that kid's going places.

dialogue_lines.title: About Oleg
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I probably owe my life to the chief.

dialogue_lines.title: About Bronya
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: It was the first time both of us had seen Belobog's real sky... the same sky.
dialogue_lines.UnlockDesc: Unlocked after completing Trailblaze Mission "The Return."

dialogue_lines.title: About Luka
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You think I'm too competitive? Ha, guess you haven't met Luka.

dialogue_lines.title: Eidolon Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Where there's hope, there's the will to fight.

dialogue_lines.title: Character Ascension
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Good news...? I'll take it.

dialogue_lines.title: Max Level Reached
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ha, try standing in my way now.

dialogue_lines.title: Trace Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Aha, that'll come in handy.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Hook
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hook? Shouldn't you be in... *sigh* Fine, just stay close.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Bronya
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'll take the front line. Stay safe, Bronya.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Natasha
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Managed to grab some sleep, Nat? Don't burn yourself out.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Luka
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Pair up with him? *sigh* Alright, Luka, let's do this.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: So you are afraid of me.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: *sigh* Great.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: What a headache.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Don't mess with me.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Idling
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Come on, I wanna try something out.

dialogue_lines.title: Basic ATK
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Who's next?

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Light Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ahhh.

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Argh, only a scratch.

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Activate
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'll free you from your chains.

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Unleash
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Disappear among the sea of butterflies, illusions of the past!

dialogue_lines.title: Talent
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Let me end your misery.

dialogue_lines.title: Downed
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I can still fight...

dialogue_lines.title: Return to Battle
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: It's not over yet.

dialogue_lines.title: Health Recovery
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Thanks.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Won
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: A sharp scythe needs targets.

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Time well spent.

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Mm-hmm, not bad.

dialogue_lines.title: Precious Treasure Opening
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hey! Pretty generous.

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Not bad at all.

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: That was unnecessarily difficult...

dialogue_lines.title: Enemy Target Found
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Enemies ahead... up for a scrap?

dialogue_lines.title: Returning to Town
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Let's take it in turns. You rest, I'll stand guard.

story.1: A spirited and valiant member of Wildfire who grew up in the perilous Underworld of Belobog. She is accustomed to being on her own.\nThe protectors and the protected, the oppressors and the oppressed... The world Seele grew up knowing was just a simple dichotomy...\nThat is, until "that girl" appeared.
story.2:
Seele's first fight in her life was for herself.

Back then, she would wander aimlessly through the alleyways each day. When she was thirsty, she'd beg for water at the orphanage. When she was hungry, she'd swap scraps she found with the merchants for biscuits. Everyone in the dark side of Rivet Town knew that fearless homeless girl, and everyone was keen to avoid this wild, stubborn little rascal.

One hot evening, she felt very thirsty from too much playing. She arrived at the orphanage to discover the bucket containing water from the well is almost empty. Another shriveled homeless man was also there trying to get a drink — and after a power struggle which involved fists and even teeth, the man fled and Seele earned the right to slake her thirst alone.

Seele saw the man three days later. Through the window of the clinic, she saw that wizened figure at death's door, lying on a stretcher.

Ever since then, she's always left a little water in the bucket for the people coming later.
story.3:
As a child, Seele only ever went up to the Overworld once. That was after she'd met Oleg — who at the time was still captain of the Underworld's Silvermane Guards. Oleg hid Seele in his supply bag one day and took her up to the Overworld by cable car to give her a peek at the city she yearned for.

Seele followed Oleg around the sights of Belobog, eating delicious foods and dressing up in splendid clothes beyond her wildest imagination. She scared off a group of kids with her uncouth miner slang, which caused Oleg to burst out into laughter. Those two short days were full of joy and laughter.

Before leaving that evening, they sat on a bench in the Administrative District Plaza as Seele stared at the restaurant opposite them.

"Was the Overworld fun, Seele? Wanna come back again later?"
"Can I ask you something?"
"...What's up? Ask away."
"Those Overworlders are only eating half their meal, and threw the rest away."
"..."
"Do they know that people down below haven't got enough food to eat?"
"..."

Oleg saw how a look of gloom passed over her tender face.

"Let's go back, Oleg. I don't want to come back here again."
story.4:
Lying on the clinic's bed, Seele is finally able to calm herself down as she silently thought over her experiences since becoming a member of Wildfire.

Injuries and blood are routine occurrences for her. Seele has a better-than-average tolerance for pain, which allows her to fully unleash herself in combat — ignoring any lingering bumps and bruises.

Wounds will always heal, just as the threat of the Fragmentum will always grow. Just as people always return to their boring lives once rescued. Sometimes, a misconception would pop up in Seele's mind, as if time in the Underworld had come to a standstill... It somehow seems that all the efforts she and Wildfire had made are all in vain.

The doctor comes over and gently asks about her injury. Seele struggles to organize words, and conveys her confusion to the doctor.

"What's more important than miracles, Seele," the doctor says with a smile as she places her palm lightly on Seele's forehead, "is to protect people's hopes for miracles."
story.5:
The Administrative District Plaza is a crowded place, and it's where almost half the residents of Belobog are now gathering. Suppressing her disdain for bustling crowds, Seele scans across the faces in the Plaza with her careful gaze.

Her hard work pays off, and she soon locks onto a target. A man wearing a gray hat, his hands in his pockets, is scuttling back and forth through the crowds while slyly looking from side to side with a sharp expression. After confirming that nobody is watching — at least, so he thinks — the man reaches out to grab the satchel of the woman beside him.

But before his fingers could reach the bag's zip, a slender but forceful hand quickly grabs his wrist. He nearly cries out with the pain, but Seele clasps her other hand over his mouth.

"Not a peep from you."

The majestic cry of horns resounds throughout the skies, and the bustling crowd falls silent immediately. A man in a comical outfit rushes to the podium, and shouts in a piercing voice —

"Ladies and gentlemen! For the ribbon-cutting part of this ceremony, please welcome to the stage — the Supreme Guardian herself, Madam Bronya Rand!"

Deafening cheers erupt from the plaza. Seele quietly pulls the pickpocket out of the crowd during the ruckus, and escorts him to the Silvermane Guards on duty. She turns to look back at the distant stage, and briefly locks eyes with the woman in the white dress. The Supreme Guardian flashes her an ever-so-brief smile, and Seele nods slightly in response.

And then, they go their separate ways — one stepping into the light, the other into the shadows.
— One day, they will finally meet again.

dialogue_lines.title: First Meeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hi {NICKNAME}, the name's Serval Landau, I'm a Belobog mechanic. Of course, that's really just what I do on the side — rock 'n' roll is my main occupation.

dialogue_lines.title: Greeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Huh? You start work this early?

dialogue_lines.title: Parting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Signing off now! Time to get some songwriting going~

dialogue_lines.title: About Self: Landau
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: If we Landaus have one thing in common, it's that we're all stubborn in our own way.

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Working as a Mechanic
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: If you wanna make sure you don't burn yourself out or stifle your creativity, then don't push yourself too hard at work~

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Band
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Pela's got a lot on her plate — plus she also does volunteer work on the weekends sometimes. That's why we usually schedule Mechanical Fever's rehearsals at night.

dialogue_lines.title: Hobbies
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Since I do rock 'n' roll full-time, I'd say my hobby is... work? What's wrong with that?

dialogue_lines.title: Annoyances
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I always get people asking me how my workshop makes money when it's not trading. Use your brain! It doesn't!

dialogue_lines.title: Something to Share
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Mechanics, research, and music are all things I'm pretty good at, wouldn't you say? But I guess making money's not on the list...

dialogue_lines.title: Knowledge
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: When Bronya becomes the supreme guardian, do you reckon she'll let me perform at Golden Theater? I'll re-arrange that "Supreme Guardian" stage show and make it a rock 'n' roll musical!

dialogue_lines.title: About Gepard
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: If he paid more attention to his affairs, it'd save me a lot of headaches... I guess I do create a few headaches for him too... Maybe we're even.

dialogue_lines.title: About Pela
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: She's a flower-growing drummer and a great report writer. Name a more reliable girl. I'll wait.

dialogue_lines.title: About Bronya
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Bronya's a good kid — you can tell she learned a lot from Cocolia. *sigh* It's been a while since we saw each other. I miss her.

dialogue_lines.title: About Cocolia
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The Cocolia I knew would sit on the roof and listen to my songs, but... not the supreme guardian.

dialogue_lines.title: About Sampo
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hah, that guy. One of these days he's gonna get busted by my brother.

dialogue_lines.title: About Lynx
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Lynxy? ...She's more like me. Ah, don't tell my brother that, he hates hearing it.

dialogue_lines.title: Eidolon Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Rock 'n' roll might be my only true companion...

dialogue_lines.title: Character Ascension
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Nice! I should write this into my next song...

dialogue_lines.title: Max Level Reached
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: That's it? I've peaked already?

dialogue_lines.title: Trace Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ta-da! Another one off the to-do list.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Pela
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Just like being on stage, right Pela? I'll follow your rhythm.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Gepard
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: *sigh* You again, Geppie? Leave some fun for me this time.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Lynx
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ready, Lynxy? Let's rock!

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Bronya
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: *sigh* Your mother would be proud of you, Bronya.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Time for the main event.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Here to crash the party?

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Pretty good crowd today.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: This song's just for you~

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Idling
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The audience is waiting!

dialogue_lines.title: Basic ATK
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Let's rock!

dialogue_lines.title: Skill 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Keep up with my tempo!

dialogue_lines.title: Skill 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Turn up the volume!

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Light Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: That's it?

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Not bad.

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Activate
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ready to lose yourself?

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Unleash
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Fight it or rock with it... my music conquers all!

dialogue_lines.title: Downed
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The show... must go on...

dialogue_lines.title: Return to Battle
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Time for an encore~

dialogue_lines.title: Health Recovery
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ah~ Ready to jam~

dialogue_lines.title: Technique
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Can't stop the rock!

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Won
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The best is yet to come!

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Wow, good stuff.

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Wow!

dialogue_lines.title: Precious Treasure Opening
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Never expected to find this here!

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'm getting the hang of this.

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Wish I had time to examine its inner workings!

dialogue_lines.title: Enemy Target Found
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Huh, these targets will make for good practice~

dialogue_lines.title: Returning to Town
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: There's inspiration in every glance and every breeze.

story.1: The free and rebellious eldest daughter of the Landau family. Once a close friend of Cocolia's, she is now a mechanic purely because she likes this job.\nIn the Everwinter-stricken Belobog, she opened a workshop called "Neverwinter" that puts business on hold from time to time for outdoor rock 'n' roll performances.\nAnd should anyone ask her about the workshop's profits... "This is just a hobby, dear. I'm not short on money."
story.2:
This is the most talented mechanic in all of Belobog and rock star. Did we mention she's also the sister of Captain Gepard Landau of the Silvermane Guards?

"Stop. Stop that. Keep the first part, and leave out the second part."
"I'd like you not to gloss over my identity like that... I, Serval Landau, am no one's accessory."

"...Oh, there's nothing else afterward? Okay. Let me chip in then: If something's broken, drop into the Neverwinter Workshop in the Administrative District to see me, any time."
"What's that, you wanna hear some rock'n'roll? Well, that's even better — drop into our Neverwinter Workshop in the Administrative District to rock this city — with Mechanical Fever!"
story.3:
Serval Landau owns a piece of land in the heart of Belobog's Administrative District — the Neverwinter Workshop — where she in theory makes a living from her mechanical repairs.

But to be more precise, almost all of this genius mechanic's time is spent repairing and making improvements to various musical instruments...

"Tsk, don't pay any attention to that magazine! I'm a reputable business owner..."
"From geomarrow radiators to car engines — or even a Silvermane automaton — it's no trouble at all. As well as maintenance and renovations of ordinary appliances, I also provide a modding service."
"Like fitting an external drill bit to a snowplow, or a ballistic trajectory calculator to a toaster... That kinda stuff."

"Ah? You want to know how's business going? Hey, don't ask so many questions — you know I like to fool around with music in my spare time."
"Anyway, I never planned on making a fortune... Life's too short. Why not plunge yourself into your hobbies?"
story.4:
Serval was able to rekindle her passion for music after cutting off all connections with her family.

This led to her prestigious workshop becoming a base for her to rock out — despite suffering constant complaints, this cutting-edge art style from before the Eternal Freeze is still sought out by hordes of hipster kids...

"Oh, I give up! Can you trashy tabloids and your so-called "music critics" focus on what's important, please? 'Suffering constant complaints'... 'hipster kids'... My fans and I would dispute that!"
"But I suppose it's true that Mechanical Fever is popular with youths — at that age, kids are either full of enthusiasm or are underappreciated..."
"No matter what your mood is, you always have to vent sometimes. And rocking out with me just so happens to be the best way of doing that!"

"...Just like what I did back in the day."
"Ahh, it's fine! Don't worry. I was just suddenly reminiscing about the past..."
story.5:
In days gone by, everyone knew that Serval Landau was the smartest out of all the Silvermane Guards — 80% of the rumors about the talented elder daughter of the Landaus are based around this fact.

However those rumors were almost instantly replaced by a new piece of gossip a few years ago. Why was she, who had always been close with the Supreme Guardian, being fired from the armed forces with no prior warning? Does Serval hold a grudge about it? Everyone has their own theory.

"The answer to the first question is simple: 'No comment.' This is the Silvermane Guards's top secret. I hope you understand."
"And as for the second question..."

"I... I don't give two hoots. Think about it. Is there anything better than living out a justifiably leisurely life? I prefer to say that woman helped me out — I really owe her a debt!"
"In this world, it's better to enjoy the present moment... No, who am I kidding."

"If our ends are already doomed, there will be no such thing as true joy."

dialogue_lines.title: First Meeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: My name is Gepard Landau, I'm a captain of the Silvermane Guards. If you discover anything suspicious in the city, you can always report it to me.

dialogue_lines.title: Greeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You're here. I just finished training.

dialogue_lines.title: Parting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: My apologies, I still have an assignment to attend to. I'll have to see you off from here.

dialogue_lines.title: About Self
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: As a Silvermane Guard, I observe the oath not because I fear to go against it, but because I am obliged to uphold it.

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Belobog
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Belobog is far from buried in the snow curtain. This city is the planet's last bastion against the ferocity of the Eternal Freeze.

dialogue_lines.title: Hobbies
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I grow flowers, *sigh* ...It's just that I'm not very good at it.

dialogue_lines.title: Annoyances
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: My sister's songs are very popular among the Guards — there's always someone singing one when we're off duty. Recently I've found myself humming them without realizing, even when I'm on duty... *sigh*

dialogue_lines.title: Something to Share
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The Landau family has had the honor and responsibility of serving the supreme guardians for generations. Only by becoming a shield for the people is one worthy of the title "Architect."

dialogue_lines.title: Knowledge
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Lately, many children have come to ask me how to become a captain... *sigh* To be honest, the best advice I can give is to keep training and have a balanced diet.

dialogue_lines.title: About Bronya
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Lady Bronya has ventured deep into the most dangerous regions of the front line with us — many times for that matter.

dialogue_lines.title: About Serval
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Many people seem to like talking about how my sister changed since she left the Guards, but in reality... she's exactly the same person.

dialogue_lines.title: About Pela
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I heard my sister started asking Pela to look after my flowers when I'm away... I hope it's not too much trouble for her.

dialogue_lines.title: About Cocolia
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I've always firmly believed that no one knows this city better or loves it more than the supreme guardian.

dialogue_lines.title: About Sampo
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: He's very... cunning. According to leads provided by citizens, he's got his hands on a number of ancient relics. He sold off most of them, but it seems he's using others to commit various frauds.

dialogue_lines.title: About Lynx
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: My little sister has a... peculiar streak. No, no, I don't mean a bad temper... *sigh* Let's just say she reminds me more of Serval than me.

dialogue_lines.title: Eidolon Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The Silvermane Guards stand ready to defend Belobog.

dialogue_lines.title: Character Ascension
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: One bridgehead at a time.

dialogue_lines.title: Max Level Reached
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Medals of the past won't win the battles of tomorrow.

dialogue_lines.title: Trace Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Essential to a Silvermane Guard's progression.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Pela
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The troops are counting on your intel, Officer Pela.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Serval
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Stay alert, sis. This is a different kind of arena.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Lynx
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Don't run ahead, Lynx.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Bronya
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I will fight alongside you, Lady Bronya.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: This ends here.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Strengthen our defenses.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I hope you're prepared.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You will know justice.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Idling
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: *Ahem* We have a situation at hand.

dialogue_lines.title: Basic ATK
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The die is cast.

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Light Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Is that all?

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: It'll heal.

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Activate
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: In the name of Landau.

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Unleash
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Years of cold hardens the will. We shall never fall!

dialogue_lines.title: Talent
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'm here to the end.

dialogue_lines.title: Downed
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I... can't...

dialogue_lines.title: Return to Battle
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'm still needed.

dialogue_lines.title: Health Recovery
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You have my gratitude.

dialogue_lines.title: Technique
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'm with you.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Won
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: We caught them unawares.

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: A little goes a long way.

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Allocate these resources appropriately.

dialogue_lines.title: Precious Treasure Opening
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: We should put these to good use.

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Well done.

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Practice makes perfect.

dialogue_lines.title: Enemy Target Found
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Seize the initiative.

dialogue_lines.title: Returning to Town
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: If we're not on patrol, we should get some rest.

story.1: The honorable and upstanding captain of the Silvermane Guards who bears the noble Landau family name.\nIn the frost-whipped city of Belobog, life can still go on in normality...\nThis is in no small part thanks to Gepard and his Silvermane Guards who protect the peace of everyday life.
story.2:
The young captain stands atop the northern rampart.

He surveys the pale wastelands before him, and watches the strange beings from the Fragmentum forming a broiling swarm in the distance amid the snow. He sees the fearless Silvermane Guards lining up in formation to guard the city, like a defensive parapet.

That was his original position. Back when he was still a humble private, he'd sworn to serve as Belobog's strongest shield and pledged to live and die with his comrades. This hasn't changed when he became a captain. This isn't some fireside joke of the Silvermane Guards, because Qlipoth is testimony to this oath.

However, right at this time, he isn't where he should be — and this is at the request of the Supreme Guardian.

What exactly is the Supreme Guardian thinking? The young captain has no idea. But he soon forces himself to focus on the conflict at hand.

"Remember, Gepard Landau."
"Doubt breeds arrogance, and doubt breeds evil. As a model for Belobog, you shouldn't overthink."

The young captain stands atop the northern rampart.
story.3:
After the most epic of battles, the few surviving Silvermane guards made their way back to Belobog. The Supreme Guardian ordered an immediate parade to celebrate this hard-earned victory. For more than three days and nights, the whole city reveled in a carnival with great laughter and joy. The celebration reached its climax at an awards ceremony for the Silvermane Guards.

Under the watchful gaze of the crowds, the Supreme Guardian presented an award to the greatest soldiers for outstanding military service. This young captain from a noble house quietly puts on the arm armor forged out of Geomarrow — Light, flexible, and strong, while radiating a light reminiscent of auroras — That's the only impression he had of this treasure.

How many of his comrades' lives had been exchanged for such a glorious medal? He forces himself not to think about it. For now, he could only meet the expectations of the Supreme Guardian and all of Belobog with a smile — because this is what a loyal soldier must do.

The moment the captain finishes putting on the arm armor, a brilliant beam of light shoots out from the joints between the plates. The crowd erupts into a spontaneous and prolonged applause.

Nobody sees the weary faces beneath the helmets of those Silvermane Guards — they merely thought this is a triumphant victory.
story.4:
The Supreme Guardian made the correct choice.

After the war, many residents of Belobog could finally let out a sigh of relief and pick up the pieces of their simple lives. However, not even the Captain himself could have imagined that after this facade for peace, they would face an ever more tragic all-out war. Without outside help, this protracted war would usher in the demise of all Belobog.

Right now, he is checking whether his shield, Earthwork, is still functioning as before. This heavy force field device was hand-crafted by his sister out of an instrument case — and if anything is broken, the poor captain would have to rely on his rockstar of a sister to help fix it.

"Gepard, if — and I do mean, if — " he thinks back to her words, "If one day, the Supreme Guardian orders you to abandon the people of Belobog to complete some goal of hers... What would you do?"
"She would never do that. She is the Supreme Guardian." He was resolute.
"I'm speaking hypothetically." She looked at him.
"I'm not sure why you're asking, but I've pledged an Oath of Preservation to Qlipoth. I will protect Belobog and her people at any cost — including my own life, of course."
"If one day, protecting the people means disobeying the Supreme Guardian's orders — and if either choice would land me in danger — then I'd still choose the former, because that is what I'm supposed to do."
They both fell silent, before she laughed out loud.
"Gepard, oh Gepard..."
"You really are a Landau, aren't you?"
story.5:
The young captain stands atop the northern rampart.

He glances out the corner of his eye at the esteemed Guardian. He sees her head held high as she gazes into the blizzard, as if nothing in the city below has anything to do with her. Her people could not make her happy or angry, sad, or scared. There is only emptiness in those eyes.

What exactly is the Supreme Guardian thinking? The young captain racks his brains, but could not find any answer.

The cacophony of elegant bagpipes explodes in the air to signify the beginning of the assault, instantly shredding the snow curtain — and those brave warriors in blue uniform respond to the call, lifting up their halberds one after the other and pointing the tips at the swarming hordes of alien monsters. Beneath the cover of artillery, they commence their charge to the death.

Gepard Landau, what should you think about this? The young captain racks his brains.

"Remember, Gepard Landau — "
"You will defend Belobog and her people at any cost — you will never let down the people you're supposed to protect... Never bring the Landau name into shame!"

This time, the young captain finally finds his answer
— as he strides out towards the battlefield.

dialogue_lines.title: First Meeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Nice to meet you, I'm Natasha — an Underworld doctor. Feeling sick? Take a seat, let me take a look.

dialogue_lines.title: Greeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'm in today. But that is not an excuse for misbehavior.

dialogue_lines.title: Parting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Today feels fighting fit.

dialogue_lines.title: About Self
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I see all kinds of patients. Some require a gentle touch, others need a stern talking to before they take things seriously... Haha, a doctor should always use the right cure for the right person.

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Medicine
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: A patient's medicine doesn't just reveal their illness. It also offers a window into their desires and needs.

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Wildfire
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: People join Wildfire for themselves, for the newborn next door without a mother, for the elderly with no home to return to.

dialogue_lines.title: Hobbies
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I still occasionally practice suturing on my old teddy bear, just like in the old days.

dialogue_lines.title: Annoyances
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: People in the Underworld have gotten used to making the best of a bad situation. That's why I have to keep reminding myself that we're nowhere near where we need to be.

dialogue_lines.title: Something to Share
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Humans long for freedom. If they go for too long without seeing the sky, they get ill... Both in body and mind.

dialogue_lines.title: Knowledge
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: When the childrens' parents are away in the mines, the clinic becomes a kind of nursery... Haha, to be fair, it's me who invites them. Perhaps I need them more than they need me.

dialogue_lines.title: About Seele
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Seele's already become a capable adult — I can't treat her like a child anymore.

dialogue_lines.title: About Clara
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I heard she's been looking after the wounded vagrants. What a girl... When I first met Clara, she was replacing parts for her robots like a mechanic, but leaving her own wounds unattended. It was heartbreaking to watch.

dialogue_lines.title: About Svarog
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Svarog wants to preserve humanity, but he's not concerned about what humans truly think.

dialogue_lines.title: About Sampo
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: If I know Sampo, the last thing he wants is to owe you a favor — he'll think of any way possible to pay you back... The longer you leave a favor, the harder it is to calculate its value.

dialogue_lines.title: About Hook
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Sometimes I stand at the door of the clinic and watch her running and jumping around... and my tiredness simply goes away.

dialogue_lines.title: About Oleg
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: We both came from the Overworld. Maybe that's why we're so eager to turn back the clock — to return to when life below ground was no harder than life on the surface.
dialogue_lines.UnlockDesc: Unlocked after completing Trailblaze Mission "The Return."

dialogue_lines.title: About Luka
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: That kid puts up a strong front, but under the surface he's afraid of becoming a burden — that's why he trains and fights so hard... I hope one day he's able to slow down and listen to his heart.

dialogue_lines.title: Eidolon Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: With this strength, I can save more lives.

dialogue_lines.title: Character Ascension
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: A doctor never stops learning.

dialogue_lines.title: Max Level Reached
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'll put this strength to good use.

dialogue_lines.title: Trace Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Wise choice.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Seele
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Has that wound fully healed, Seele?

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Hook
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Room for an "old witch," Hook?

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Sampo
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I've got my eye on you.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Luka
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Take care of yourself, Luka.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: That'll take more than medicine.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Don't get careless.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Naughty children don't listen.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Time for a shot.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Idling
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Seems I've been waiting a while...

dialogue_lines.title: Basic Attack 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You're in bad shape.

dialogue_lines.title: Basic Attack 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Savor the vigor of life.

dialogue_lines.title: Basic Attack 3
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Naptime.

dialogue_lines.title: Skill 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Here comes the medicine.

dialogue_lines.title: Skill 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: All better now?

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Light Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'm okay.

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: That hurt...

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Activate
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Just in time.

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Unleash
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Just a little something. Think nothing of it.

dialogue_lines.title: Downed
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: But I'm a... doctor...

dialogue_lines.title: Return to Battle
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I have plenty of medicine at the ready.

dialogue_lines.title: Health Recovery
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'll be more careful.

dialogue_lines.title: Technique
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Found you.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Won
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: A delicate operation.

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: If there's medicine, it'll come in handy.

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: This is enough for me — take the rest.

dialogue_lines.title: Precious Treasure Opening
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: These will last us a long time.

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hm, that's a healthy brain.

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Cute little game~

dialogue_lines.title: Enemy Target Found
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Victory means preparation.

dialogue_lines.title: Returning to Town
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hard work needs hard rest.

story.1: A fastidious doctor who always wears an enigmatic smile.\nIn the Underworld where medical resources are scarce, Natasha is one of the very few doctors whom the people can turn to.\nEven the rambunctious Hook would politely greet her... "Hi, big sis Natasha."
story.2:
"Quick, press down here! Press down hard to staunch the bleeding!"

Natasha shoots a panicked look at her brother. Before her lay a man covered in bandages from head to toe, his torso twitching and twisting with severe pain as he muttered nonsense.

"What are you waiting for!? Quick, hold it down!"

There is anger in her brother's order and — she is sharp enough to tell — a hint of disappointment. Natasha hurries to hold onto the man's right arm, and musters all her strength to press down the cotton gauze onto his shoulder.

The man lets out a heart-wrenching moan, but she can't stop until her brother orders her to.

After who knows how long, the patient before her stops breathing, and she stares blankly at the lifeless body.

"You did your best," her brother says. His voice returning to its usual impassive tone. "Get some rest real quick. Some of them are still waiting to be patched up."

She turns over the man's red palm. His fingers are already stiff as the stench of blood fills the air. Natasha allows the smell to rile up her emotions — she know she must get used to this if she were to continue down this road.
story.3:
"Excellent... excellent as always," the professor says to herself as she flips through the notes, "With your grades and clinical performance... You'll be an outstanding candidate whether you're in the hospital or in the armed forces."

Natasha's pulse races, and her fingers subconsciously clench up. The professor notices her body language.

"What's the matter, child? Have you got something to say?"

Natasha composes herself — she wants to convey her decision with confidence and conviction.

"I want to go back to the Underworld, Professor. I know I can help more people down there."

The old woman is stunned for a brief moment, before slowly pushing her glasses upwards. Then, she lowers her head and continues on reading the file she is holding.

"I see. That's exactly what your mother said... I wish you all the best then, Natasha."

Natasha stands up and solemnly bows. As she walks through that white corridor at Belobog Medical Academy for the last time, her heart is filled with determination.
story.4:
Dearest mother and father,

How have you been?

Please forgive me for replying so late. There's been lots of trouble in the Underworld, and the orphanage is overcrowded with the injured, so I haven't had time to do anything apart from treating the wounded. I even had to send some of the younger children to foster families in town, because I didn't want them to see the carnage inside the orphanage.

As for your previous question — yes, I've heard rumors about the Supreme Guardian about to order a blockade between the Over- and Underworlds. I understand your concerns, but from my point of view, there is no way I can abandon the people down here right now. During this extraordinary state of panic, I can only hope to use my modest skills to bring a modicum of comfort to the needy.

Fortunately, I know you'll respect my decision. I still remember when I was fresh out of college and Dad told me, "Anyone going into medicine to just get a decent job will come to regret their decision sooner or later." I think I understand more than ever what you meant back then.

I don't know when we'll ever be able to see each other again, but I hope you can be healthy and happy. Your daughter is a big girl now, and can take care of herself, so you don't have to worry about me.

Your daughter, with love, 
Natasha
story.5:
The man lying on the hospital bed is tanned and about fifty years old. His muscles are chiseled like a sculpture, but are now covered in layers of scars and bloody stains. He is breathing heavily, his chest heaving violently — he is right at death's door.

Natasha's eyes move quickly over to the patient, searching for anything fatal that could rob him of his life. She soon locates a wound on his lower left abdomen. Although it isn't large, the bleeding is constant and it's likely that his internal organs had been injured by some kind of sharp weapon.

She put on a new pair of gloves and tears a large piece of bandage off the roll. She skillfully and tightly wraps it tightly around the patient's waist, pressing down on the area that is bleeding. A dark red spreads through the surface of the bandage, but Natasha maintains her pressure without betraying the slightest hint of panic.

After a short while, the man's breathing is no longer rapid and the tense expression on his face eases. Natasha knows he is out of danger and has safely fallen asleep.

She slowly takes off her gloves and leans against the clinic's window sill in a brief repose.

"Please don't die, Oleg..."

She whispers to herself as she gazes at the bed.

"...There're still a lot of duties we need to complete."
