dialogue_lines.title: First Meeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Pelageya Sergeyevna, Silvermane Guards Intelligence Officer, at your service. You can call me Pela.

dialogue_lines.title: Greeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You ready? Let's start the records for the day.

dialogue_lines.title: Parting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The reports look pretty normal today. You can go have some rest.

dialogue_lines.title: About Self
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'm good at documenting information and coming up with my analysis. Acting on that analysis is the captain's job.

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Role in the Band
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: People don't usually notice the drummer, but if you miss a beat, everyone feels it. I like the challenge.

dialogue_lines.title: Hobbies
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I like to go to the library on the weekend and take out some... literature. Then when we're finished reading, me and my friends meet up to discuss it.

dialogue_lines.title: Annoyances
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: *sigh* Sometimes I practice over a dozen times before reporting to my superiors, but I still can't get it right...

dialogue_lines.title: Something to Share
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: There are 32 versions of my full name circulating among the troops. How do I know? I'm an intelligence officer after all.

dialogue_lines.title: Knowledge
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: *gasp* A new edition of the fanbook "Tale of the Winterlands?" That's one of the most sought-after series out there... H—How many copies should I get... Ten? Is ten enough...?

dialogue_lines.title: About Bronya
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: In all of Belobog, you won't find anyone who speaks more elegantly or acts more like a leader than Lady Bronya.

dialogue_lines.title: About Serval
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: *sigh* Serval's rule is: no rules.

dialogue_lines.title: About Gepard
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Captain Gepard is an honorable man and very reliable. But when it comes to his horticultural skills... all I can say is I respect his effort and wish him the best of luck.

dialogue_lines.title: About Lynx
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Lynxy is one of my... Uh, Lynx is one of my... Ahem! Lynx is... one of Belobog's number one researchers, and... one of my best besties!

dialogue_lines.title: Eidolon Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Stay focused, push forward.

dialogue_lines.title: Character Ascension
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Mm, there's still room for improvement.

dialogue_lines.title: Max Level Reached
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Finally, all contingencies covered.

dialogue_lines.title: Trace Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Mm, this is valuable intel.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Gepard
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Glad to be of service, Captain Gepard.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Serval
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Remember, Serval — don't rush the beat.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Lynx
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Let's do this, Lynxy!

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Bronya
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Expect a decisive victory, Lady Bronya.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: We have the upper hand.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Do we still have the upper hand?

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Commencing support.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Enemy targets detected.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Idling
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Time to make a decision.

dialogue_lines.title: Basic Attack 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Enough.

dialogue_lines.title: Basic Attack 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ready for another?

dialogue_lines.title: Basic Attack 3
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'll contain them!

dialogue_lines.title: Skill 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: This... that... Oh!

dialogue_lines.title: Skill 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Inputting commands... Oh!

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Light Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ouch.

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Eek ...Not good.

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Activate
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Enemy data secured.

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Unleash
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Net markers activated — time for a good old counterattack.

dialogue_lines.title: Downed 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I miscalculated...

dialogue_lines.title: Downed 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Run...

dialogue_lines.title: Return to Battle
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I won't make the same mistake twice.

dialogue_lines.title: Health Recovery
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Thanks for the support.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Won
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The combat report will be ready soon.

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Inventory complete.

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: It's received.

dialogue_lines.title: Precious Treasure Opening
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: All in order — leave nothing behind.

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Wowwww... *clears throat*

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: ...That did the trick!

dialogue_lines.title: Enemy Target Found
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Analyze the targets before you make a plan of action.

dialogue_lines.title: Returning to Town
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Do you need me to formulate the next plan?

story.1: The meticulous Intelligence Officer of the Silvermane Guards. While young, she is undeniably brilliant.\nWhether it relates to maneuvering troops, distributing supplies, or the analyzing terrain, Pela can answer any problems with calm certainty.\nAs for her phone case... "It has nothing to do with work, captain."
story.2:
The following is an excerpt from page 102 of the Silvermane Guards Recruitment Records: Intelligence Department — Vol. 24:

Basic information about the candidate —

"My name is Pelageya Sergeyevna, but you can call me Pela."
"I graduated from the Faculty of Social Sciences and the Faculty of Science from the Belobog Cadet School, with a double honorary degree in Military Studies and Cryptography."
"My hobbies? Pardon me, I need a minute to collect myself..."
"...My hobby is studying prehistoric Belobog music. That's it."
"No, no, I have no other hobbies... Really... Please trust me."
story.3:
The following is an excerpt from page 103 of the Silvermane Guards Recruitment Records: Intelligence Department — Vol. 24:

As for what is an honorary degree —

"Please allow me to recite from the Belobog Sergeant Education and Degree Awarding Regulations Version 3, Chapter 5, Section 23, Article 1, Paragraph 7...:"
"An Honorary Bachelor's degree will be conferred to students who have not met the minimum age requirement but have earned enough credits from courses of corresponding majors."
"That's right. I currently have no plans for postgraduate study, and never will."
"I find practice far better than theory, Madam."
story.4:
One snowy Belobog evening, underneath the massive stopped clock, the laughter of girls spilled out from a warmly-lit window.

"Studying prehistoric Belobog music!? That's just ridiculous! Didn't Cocolia bother to ask about that?" The slightly older woman rocks back and forth with laughter.

"Please address her as Madam Cocolia, Serval." A petite girl pouts as she take off her steamed-up round glasses. "She has to know that I'm playing in your band."

The girl in the cat ears hat — she is reluctant to take it off even when inside — chimes in. "...You really are a piece of work. Does Madam Cocolia know what your other hobbies are?"

"Ha. No way." The woman named Serval gets up from her bedding on the floor. "I've lived with her for so long and never seen her pick up a novel — she says they're a complete waste of time..."

"Okay. Pela, Lynx — We need to go to the Tale of the Winterlands fan meet tomorrow. Let's get some rest."
story.5:
If you're familiar with the street gossip of Belobog, then there's no way you could miss the Tale of the Winterlands. And if you're an avid Tale fan, then you'll definitely have heard of the fan meet. Its time and location are a secret, and attendance is by special invite only.

Attendants are split into only two categories: content creators, and the consumers who love the created content. They all have a genuine love for the Tale of the Winterlands, and do their bit to support this monumental masterpiece of Belobog literature.

Among them, a new legend is born — It is said that she is a petite woman. It is said she never missed a single meet. It is said she always wore a mask. It is said she once spent a small fortune on a limited-edition artbook. It is said that when ever she creates something, her work would cause a huge sensation among the dedicated fan base...

"That's a whole lot of rumors, yet none of them are related to the Silvermane Guards..."
"Looks like... My skills of disguise really are fantastic after all. Teehee!"

dialogue_lines.title: First Meeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Clara: Hello... I'm Clara. Wanna be in my family? ...Like Mr. Svarog?\nSvarog: As long as I'm here, {NICKNAME} is your family.

dialogue_lines.title: Greeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Let's keep up the good work today!

dialogue_lines.title: Parting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'm getting sleepy — time for a nap on Mr. Svarog's arm. Are you coming?

dialogue_lines.title: About Self: Memories
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Memories are important. Even Mr. Svarog's calculations need to take them into account... I won't forget about you.

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Playing House
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: One time when I was playing house, I asked Perkins to get the door, and someone actually came to visit!

dialogue_lines.title: Hobbies
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: There are lots of interesting things stored in Mr. Svarog's memory bank, like... movies! It's like watching lots of people playing house together!

dialogue_lines.title: Annoyances
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: It's hard to get Mr. Svarog to act out a movie with me — he only wants to play trees or rocks... I wanted him to be the dad...

dialogue_lines.title: Something to Share
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: My robot friends can be rude sometimes, but deep down, they're kind and honest.

dialogue_lines.title: Knowledge
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: When Mr. Svarog's sleeping, his body makes a noise. It sounds like... snoring~

dialogue_lines.title: About Natasha
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Natasha said I'm also a doctor — for my robot friends.

dialogue_lines.title: About Seele
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I remember one time Miss Seele saw me trying to pull a component out of a crack in the rocks. She smashed the rocks with one hand and walked away before I had time to say thank you...

dialogue_lines.title: About Svarog
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Did you know Mr. Svarog's hands can turn into machines that dry my hair? Also, they can cut big stones and turn them into little tables and chairs...

dialogue_lines.title: About Hook
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hook invited me to join The Moles. I want to, but I think Mr. Svarog's too big to play hide and seek with us...

dialogue_lines.title: About Luka
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Luka...? He's nice to people. I know he seems kinda impatient, but he's actually very caring.

dialogue_lines.title: Eidolon Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Things will get better... won't they?

dialogue_lines.title: Character Ascension
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: One day I'll grow up and protect everyone! Mm!

dialogue_lines.title: Max Level Reached
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: My journey with Mr. Svarog has just begun...

dialogue_lines.title: Trace Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Mr. Svarog has everything in his database.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Natasha
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Miss Natasha... Let's make the Underworld a better place!

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Hook
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: H—Hook, you're here too? I won't let you down!

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Seele
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Miss Seele! With Wildfire here... nothing can stop us!

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Svarog: Target threat index lowered.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Svarog: Target threat index raised.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Clara: I need to be brave...

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Clara: I—I'm not afraid of you!

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Idling
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Clara: Time to do something...

dialogue_lines.title: Basic Attack 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Clara: Be careful, Mr. Svarog!

dialogue_lines.title: Basic Attack 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Svarog: Eliminating threat.

dialogue_lines.title: Skill 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Svarog: Hide.

dialogue_lines.title: Skill 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Svarog: Commencing annihilation.

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Light Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Svarog: Are you alright?\nClara: I'm okay!

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Clara: ...Ouch.

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Activate
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Clara: I want to protect everyone, too...

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Unleash
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Clara: Help me, Mr. Svarog!

dialogue_lines.title: Talent 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Svarog: Stay back, Clara.

dialogue_lines.title: Talent 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Svarog: As you command.

dialogue_lines.title: Downed
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Clara: Is everyone... okay...

dialogue_lines.title: Return to Battle
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Clara: I'm back.

dialogue_lines.title: Health Recovery
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Clara: Thanks. I'll never forget you.

dialogue_lines.title: Technique
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Clara: Gah!

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Won
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Clara: I hope I helped...

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Clara: If you find any components... Can I have them?

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Clara: ...C—Can I have some?

dialogue_lines.title: Precious Treasure Opening
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Clara: Th—This is too precious!

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Clara: W—We did it!

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Clara: I hope I did okay...

dialogue_lines.title: Enemy Target Found
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Svarog: High threat target ahead.

dialogue_lines.title: Returning to Town
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Clara: Don't worry, Mr. Svarog. We'll be safe here.

story.1:
A young girl raised by a robot. Her perceptiveness and tenacity are far beyond her years.
For Clara, Svarog's logical calculations are the laws of the world and are infallible.
That is, until she realizes that the results from the calculations don't always necessarily bring joy to everyone.
The once shy little girl then decides to cast aside her timidness.
story.2:
"— Log ██/██/████ AF."

"A female child discovered in a landfill to the southeast of Boulder Town."

"Scans show the child has no structural damage or functional issues, but her mental state was relatively unstable. She is resistant to questions about her condition and clearly wanted to avoid the subject."
"I have continued attempting to communicate with her, and successfully obtained some information."
"The child begins to cry, lasting three hours and seven minutes."

"The child's name is Clara. Her background is unknown."
"Conclusion: Take her back to base for observations, and collect further information to generate a follow-up plan to take care of her."
story.3:
"— Log ██/██/████ AF."

"Clara has grown proficient in the Belobog common tongue, and displays great talent in the field of mechanical engineering — but she still resists communication with other humans. Assessment: this tendency is detrimental to Clara's long-term development in Belobog."

"There is currently an urgent need to develop a suitable socialization and communication program for Clara. Priority: High."

"— Log ████/██/██ AF."

"Clara has successfully made contact with an individual of similar age in Boulder Town. The individual is named Hook, and claims to be the head manager of the local security organization The Moles. No information about this organization has been found in my database."

"Clara's contact with Hook didn't go well at first. She displayed considerable shyness. However, Hook managed to keep the conversation going with extreme enthusiasm and empathy, calling Clara an 'honorary member of The Moles.' After contact, Clara described Hook as 'her first friend.'"

"This matter is of tremendous significance to Clara, and this log has been tagged Important."
story.4:
"— Log ██/██/████ AF."

"Under Clara's guidance, many vagrants have established settlements around the periphery of the base, and rely on Clara to survive. This behavior does not contravene the orders of Preservation. However, many of them are trying to enter the Overworld via this base's transport passage. The gates of the base must be sealed tightly to avoid accelerating the demise of Belobog."

"Clara has discussed this with me before. She believes locking the gates is an 'incomprehensible' act. I responded with my predicted calculations: By over-committing her resources to the war against the Fragmentum , the Supreme Guardian is accelerating the destruction of the Overworld. Isolation would be the best option for the people of the Underworld — this would buy them more time to try and survive. In the end, Clara finally agreed."

"Most humans behave illogically, but Clara doesn't — she is raised by me and grew up among automatons, and her behavior is more based on pure rationality. Her presence may impact predicted calculations of Belobog's demise, but more observations are required."
story.5:
"— Log ██/██/████ AF."

"Ever since I was created, I've been given the command to preserve the Underworld — Even if I can only preserve it for a millisecond longer than the Overworld, I will still carry out these orders. To borrow a phrase from traditional Belobog culture, perhaps it could be put like this: 'I am faithful without hesitation to the mission I've been given.' Therefore, I see my calculations as immutable laws — nobody and nothing can ever shake me, including any Outsiders."

"However, I found this possible permutation among the calculation results."

"In this calculation, Clara completely changed Belobog. I once said of her, 'her behavior is more based on pure rationality.' If we take this probable result as a base and revisit my conclusion, I cannot view it as an error — but I admit that it is biased."

"With the results of this calculation, Clara has also proved one thing: having true rationality is not the key to changing the status quo, but rather that her sincere and passionate emotion overturned all calculations and completely reversed Belobog's doomed fate. However, unless new external forces intervene, the probability of this is less than 0.25272%, which places it in the low probability category. Further research on these calculations are paused."

"Today, the probability of survival in the Underworld has not seen a significant upward trend over the last five cycles. This means that implementation of this may be suspended, but I will still monitor all relevant risk factors."

"During this cycle, I will focus on finding Clara's family. Despite Clara insisting that she has already found her real family, I will keep collecting any and all information to track down Clara's real family as soon as I can."

dialogue_lines.title: First Meeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hey, {NICKNAME}! Y'know, with Sampo Koski by your side, you've got a businessman, chaperone, and problem-solving conversationalist, all rolled into one! Pretty sweet deal, huh?

dialogue_lines.title: Greeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: So, what's the job this time around? If you've got the cash, I've got the... No cash? N—Not a problem! Haha, just say the word, pal...

dialogue_lines.title: Parting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Come on, get some rest already! What's the matter? I'm not going anywhere.

dialogue_lines.title: About Self
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Me? I'm just an easygoing fella that looks out for the little guy — free of charge I might add — who somehow gets pulled into everyone else's business with nothing to show for it! Tsk, like I say, I'm an easygoing fella.

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Intel
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: If you package it right, you can sell the same piece of intel to different people! That, my friend, is called "maximizing your profit."

dialogue_lines.title: Hobbies
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'm a firm believer in "small talk brings big clients."

dialogue_lines.title: Annoyances
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I sell things that buyers want to buy — and they call me a con man! It's outrageous!

dialogue_lines.title: Something to Share
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You'd think in a place as isolated as Belobog, people would be more willing to share what they have. Well, it's the exact opposite. And I'm more than happy to make up the shortfall.

dialogue_lines.title: Knowledge
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Come on, how did you guys end up in the middle of the Snow Plains? UFO? Let me guess, you took a train, haha. Seriously though.

dialogue_lines.title: About Natasha
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Back when I first arrived in the Underworld, I used to bring Natasha the medicines she needed. I did that for a while, and before long it was medicines and intel. You know how these things work.

dialogue_lines.title: About Svarog
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: If anyone out there ever managed to strike a deal with Svarog, they'd earn my heartfelt admiration!

dialogue_lines.title: About Clara
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Our little girl in red is truly impressive. How did she get that giant tinhead to listen to her?

dialogue_lines.title: About Seele
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: If she had it her way, Miss Seele would spend less time yelling at me and more time actively trying to hit me. Can someone explain what I did to deserve her?

dialogue_lines.title: About Gepard
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ah, we see each other pretty often — usually it's me running away and him running after me. Gotta say, I'm gradually beginning to enjoy the attention, hehe.

dialogue_lines.title: About Serval
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: We used to be good pals, but now... Let's just say her brother put in a bad word for me.

dialogue_lines.title: About Bronya
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: My only wish is to get acquainted with the supreme guardian-to-be. Any introduction will do — even a painful one!

dialogue_lines.title: About Luka
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Have you seen him compete? A lot of Underworlders made a lot of money off that kid! *sigh* Your pal Sampo here wasn't one of them...

dialogue_lines.title: Eidolon Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Everyone has a colorful past, wouldn't you say...?

dialogue_lines.title: Character Ascension
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Double the pay, double the service!

dialogue_lines.title: Max Level Reached
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: That's it? *sigh* I was just getting started...

dialogue_lines.title: Trace Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Smart decision! I won't disappoint you, friend.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Natasha
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Miss Natasha! I thought I owed you a favor...

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Hook
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hook...? *sigh* Looks like we're playing hard ball.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Seele
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Don't worry, Miss Seele! I'll watch your back!

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With {NICKNAME}
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ha! Always an honor to have the Trailblazer by my side!

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: We're just having fun.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Good! The stronger the better.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Sampo Koski always takes care of his friends.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Sounds like more business knocking.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Idling
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Can we bring out the big guns already?

dialogue_lines.title: Skill
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Try this on for size?

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Light Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ooh, ouch...

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hey! W—Watch the face!

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Activate
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: What are you waiting for?

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Unleash
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The customer is king, and for me to betray the king, well... You gotta make it worth my while.

dialogue_lines.title: Downed
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: This price was too steep...

dialogue_lines.title: Return to Battle
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: One good turn deserves another!

dialogue_lines.title: Health Recovery
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I owe you one~

dialogue_lines.title: Technique
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Heehee~

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Won
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: How're you gonna win if you don't take any risks?

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: No cash?

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You like it? It's yours for the taking!

dialogue_lines.title: Precious Treasure Opening
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Whoa. That's good stuff! Let me take a look.

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hey now! Pretty good.

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Solving people's problems is my specialty⁓!

dialogue_lines.title: Enemy Target Found
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I dunno — this one looks kinda tough...

dialogue_lines.title: Returning to Town
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Wherever there is business, there is Sampo.

story.1: A silver-tongued salesman. Where there is profit to be made, you can be sure Sampo is nearby.\nThe information that only Sampo possesses makes it hard not to approach him for help, but becoming his "customer" is not necessarily a good thing.\nAfter all, "customers" can quickly turn into "commodities" for the right price.
story.2:
"Hello everyone! This is Brughel Poisson from the Crystal Daily, and I'm here at Fountain Plaza in the Administrative District. Standing next to me is someone who calls themselves a member of the Dark-Blue Scam Victims' Association, and I am about to conduct a short interview with him."

"Hello there, sir. Could you please tell me and the audience about your experience of getting scammed?"

"Oh... I'm so utterly enraged! That blue-haired punk... I hope he dies!"

"Sir, we're live right now... please calm down."

"Ahem... Fine. The Crystal Daily, right? That's it. You should report more on the suffering of everyday people and pay less attention to gossip about the Architects..."

"I'm telling you, that blue-haired punk has slipped off into the Administrative District again! Yesterday he pinched three catties of rye bread spices from my store — three whole catties! Do you know how long those will last for the dignitaries? Next thing, he'll be robbing a spice factory!"

"Please calm down, sir! We sympathize deeply with your plight. Now then, you just mentioned the Belobog spice factory, didn't you?"

"Err... Sure, I mentioned it. Was that important?"

"This factory... are you able to tell me its exact location?"

"Err... Why?"

"Well you see, as journalists, we want to contribute to social justice causes — and only by knowing the exact location can our Silvermane Guards and righteous citizens reduce burglaries. Wouldn't you agree?"

"Err... That makes sense. Then listen up, the address of the factory is..."
story.3:
"Name."

"Alexey. Alexey Bulger."

"Rank."

"Private First-Class."

"Hello, Private First-Class Alexey. I'm Brughel Poisson, senior human resources specialist for the Silvermane Guards. Captain Gepard asked me to approve your application for personal leave."

"It's a pleasure to meet you, Madam Brughel."

"Let's see... It says here that you were wounded four months ago during a defensive operation, with a total of five fractures... Yet despite all this, you have continued to carry out your duties right up until now. Admirable!"

"Thank you, Madam Brughel."

"You guard the... 3rd Arsenal at the Silvermane Guard Restricted Zone, yes? Terrific! As far as I know, that's an extremely important military zone where the most expensive... Ahem, the most valuable Silvermane military resources are stored."

"You're right, ma'am."

"Let me see... Hmm, no problem. Private First-Class Alexey, at this stage you are cleared to go home next Tuesday."

"...What? So soon? As far as I know, this kind of high-level guard duty usually takes at least a month to process handovers —"

"...Don't worry, Private First-Class. I appreciate your determination to the cause, but nothing is more important to me than protecting the physical and mental well-being of one of our best Silvermane Guards! Don't worry. I've already picked out someone to fill in for you, so everything's taken care of."

"...I understand. Thank you very much, ma'am."

"That's the one! Remember, next Tuesday — I want you and your luggage out of the restricted zone before 20:17!"
story.4:
"Yo, my man."

"Yo, you're here working for Poisson, too?"

"Yeah. Are you in charge of demolitions?"

"Yup. Are you the lockpick?"

"Uh-huh."

"Nice. Then we're ready. Let's get to work."

"Unh... Unh... Done. Now let's just wait."

"That doesn't look very reliable... Can this tiny thing blow through this steel door?"

"I didn't doubt your professionalism. Why are you doubting me? Trust me. I've bombed mine shafts more times than you've had hot dinners."

"Err... okay. Getting back on topic, what did that girl tell you again?"

"The factory's abandoned, as it's completely unguarded. Just take what you want. I've never heard of such an easy job."

"Mmm, yeah that's what she told me too. But something seems kinda off to me..."

"Money's money. Don't ask so many questions. Come on, plug up your ears. It's fireworks time!"

"..."

"...Holy moly! That's too much, man... Just spectacular!"

"I told you already. Don't question my professionalism. Let's go. It's over to you now."

"Shh! Don't say anything. Can't you hear? I can hear voices inside!"

"What? N—No way, she said there were no guards."

"It's the Silvermane Guards. The Silvermane Guards! It's the end of the line for us, bro. Scram!"

"Darn it. Poisson must've set us up! That piece of scum. This isn't finished yet!"
story.5:
"Good morning, ma'am, I hope I haven't disturbed you."

"...Who are you? Why are the Silvermane Guards knocking on my door first thing in the morning?"

"I'm sorry, ma'am. We're just carrying out building-to-building searches as ordered by the Architects."

"Uh... searches? What are you searching for? I don't have anything..."

"Please calm down, ma'am — we are not targeting you. Everyone in the city is subject to questioning."

"Has something... something big happened?"

"Please trust us. Everything will turn out fine if you cooperate with us. I just have one question: Do you have any wigs at home?"

"What... Wigs? No, I don't have any. As you can see, my hair is great... Why are you asking about that?"

"Are you sure? Please think again. The Silvermane Guards have been ordered to gather up all the wigs in Belobog City. Refusal to submit may result in serious consequences..."

"No, I'm sure. I don't have any of those at home — if you don't believe me, come inside and have a look."

"Ah, that won't be necessary. I'm sure you have nothing to hide. Goodbye, ma'—"

"...Hold on a minute, can I ask what happened?"

"Oh, there's no harm in telling you. Recently, a male thief disguised as a woman has stowed away up here into the Overworld and is swindling everyone. This person is extremely slippery and changes appearance often. The Silvermane Guards have not been able to locate him. Apparently, the Minister of Security was absolutely furious at yesterday's briefing, and ordered the confiscation of all wigs in the city..."

"...Is that so? How outrageous!"

"I'll level with you. We all feel the same way as you do. We need to keep up our search, so I won't bother you any longer... Wishing you a good day, Madam Poisson."

1.SimpleSkillDesc: Enemies in a set area are Blinded. When initiating battle against a Blinded enemy, there is a high chance to delay all enemies' actions.

dialogue_lines.title: First Meeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Haha, the grown-ups in the Underworld listen to Wildfire and the kids listen to us Moles. I'm the leader of The Moles, by the way. You may call me Pitch-Dark Hook the Great!

dialogue_lines.title: Greeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Moles, Moles, leaving our holes, brave Moles, charge as a whole!

dialogue_lines.title: Parting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Moles dismissed! Sleep well and see you tomorrow!

dialogue_lines.title: About Self: Diggertron
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Diggertron used to be a hard-working mining machine. After it retired, it heard my call and became the ruthless villain-smashing iron fist!

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Members of The Moles
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Haha! Under my leadership, we recruited Julian of a Thousand Faces, Luka Strongarm, and Cunning Child! Everyone joins the cause!

dialogue_lines.title: Hobbies
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Expeditions in the mines, expeditions in the clinic, expeditions on the surface... e—expeditions in the unknown!

dialogue_lines.title: Annoyances
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: People say if you worry too much, your head gets super heavy. Wouldn't that make it harder for me to get taller? Waaaah...

dialogue_lines.title: Something to Share
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Grown-ups always say things like "you'll understand when you're older," but Hook heard you forget things when you're older! Don't believe me? Let's see who knows more stuff!

dialogue_lines.title: Knowledge
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hook's interested in loads of things, like... lizards that carry Geomarrow on their backs, o—or olms that survive without eating food... Natasha told me that there are flowers on the surface that only bloom once a year. I really really wanna go see them...

dialogue_lines.title: About Natasha
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Old witch... Ahem. Natasha is beautiful and nice, but when she gets angry she, uhh... isn't so nice. B—But still beautiful...

dialogue_lines.title: About Clara
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Waaaah... Clara... when can you join The Moles...?

dialogue_lines.title: About Svarog
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hook's Diggertron is mightier than Svarog's fist! Hmph!

dialogue_lines.title: About Sampo
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I run into Mr. Sampo almost everywhere. Does he like expeditions too?

dialogue_lines.title: About Seele
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Miss Seele talks loud, but sometimes Hook still beats her in an argument, hehe~

dialogue_lines.title: About Fersman
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hook loves daddy! One day, Hook's gonna dig up a big treasure and build daddy a huge huge house!

dialogue_lines.title: About Luka
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Luka loves to eat meat — just like Hook! That's why we're such great friends!

dialogue_lines.title: Eidolon Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hook's ready to find the next treasure!

dialogue_lines.title: Character Ascension
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Watch out! The boss of The Moles is coming to get you!

dialogue_lines.title: Max Level Reached
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hmph! Nobody's gonna look down on Pitch-Dark Hook the Great anymore!

dialogue_lines.title: Trace Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Get ready... Hook's got another pitch-dark trick up her sleeve!

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Seele
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You won't beat Hook this time, Miss Seele!

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Natasha
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Old witchy... M—Miss Natasha! I—I'll be good this time!

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Clara
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Honorary member Clara! Ready for an adventure?

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Sampo
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: It's Mr. Blue Hair! Where are we going this time?

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Luka
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Luka! Let's go beat up some bad guys...

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You've still got time to surrender!

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: N—Nobody bullies Hook!

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ha! Time to make some mischief!

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Form a line, villains!

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Idling
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hey! Don't ignore me!

dialogue_lines.title: Basic ATK
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Who are you calling small!?

dialogue_lines.title: Skill 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Eh—hehe... Didn't expect that, right?

dialogue_lines.title: Skill 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Now you see me... now you don't~

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Light Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You hit me!

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: That huuuurt!

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Activate
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Follow Hook if you wanna win!

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Unleash
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Pitch-Dark Hook the Great has arrived — make way, make way... Woo-hoo~ BANG!

dialogue_lines.title: Downed
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Wait til I tell my daddy on you...

dialogue_lines.title: Return to Battle
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hmph, what would you do without Hook?

dialogue_lines.title: Health Recovery
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: You're a good person!

dialogue_lines.title: Technique
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ehehehe~

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Won
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I hereby pronounce this expedition a success!

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Yay! Let's take it all!

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Is this for Hook?

dialogue_lines.title: Precious Treasure Opening
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Wow... Daddy will love this!

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Huh? I wanna play again!

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ha! Hook could do this blindfolded⁓

dialogue_lines.title: Enemy Target Found
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: *gasp* That one's a little scary.

dialogue_lines.title: Returning to Town
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: First you go a-searching, then you go a-running, searching, running, jump jump jump!

story.1: Head of the adventure squad "The Moles," she calls herself Pitch-Dark Hook the Great.\nShe doesn't like to be called a "kid" and believes she can handle things herself without any help from adults.\nAdults adventure into the Fragmentum, Mr. Sampo adventures on the surface, and patients take their risky adventure seeking treatment from Natasha... Under the leadership of Hook, children can also have their own adventures!
story.2:
"██/██/██  Weather: Fine  Mood: Very bad"

"Today, I broke one of the old witch's Tesh Stubes Tech Tubes Test Tubes, and got chewed out."

"The old witch is terrible! She never lets us play together during lunch, and only lets us take a nap. I hate her!"

"We should rebel against her tarany— terrany— tarreny— tyranny! We can't let her get away— gator way— get her way!"

"I'm gonna make a gang called 'The Moles', and  grab   kidnap   envit  invite all the kids from the clinic! We'll take down the old witch together! And then, we can eat whatever we want and have fun — and nobody can stop us!"

"And I'll be the boss of The Moles! And the boss of the whole clinic, too! I'll give that old witch a nice talking-to every day, and make her do all of the choars   choors  chores! Muahaha!"
story.3:
"██/██/██  Weather: Freezing Mood: Very happy"

"Today I went to the machine  garv   gravy  graveyard to find a suitable weapon. As the boss of The Moles, I've got to have a great weapon!"

"I met a girl there. She was a few years older than me (but I'm still the boss!) and was wearing a pretty red coat. But she had no shoes on. I don't know why she had no shoes on, since that's gotta be very cold! Maybe she wasn't feeling very cold though."

"Her hair was white like snow, and it was pretty! I want white hair too. Long and white hair."

"She was very shy, too shy to talk to me at first. But that's cool! I  super love talking and  super love making friends! I chatted with her for a long, long time. I know her name is Clara, and her dad is a super big robot!"

"Her dad is really cool, but not as cool as daddy Fersman! She is my friend now and she helped me find a really strong Diggertron! She's now an honorary member of The Moles!"
story.4:
"██/██/██  Weather: Still freezing  Mood:  Bad  Normal"

"Today, Alina's mom and dad came to see her. Alina was very happy and seeing her like this made me happy too."

"I thought of mom and dad. I haven't seen them for a very long time! Even though daddy Fersman is very, very kind to me, I still miss my mom and dad!"

"In the evening, daddy explained to me again the reason why mom and dad couldn't come back. But I actually remember anyway... Because daddy has told me so many times!" "I found that daddy is always forgetting things recently! I asked Natasha, and she said it's because daddy is getting too old now. Then I asked her if she can help fix daddy's sickness, but she said she can't, and even apologized."

"I think the old witch is lying to me just because I've been a little bit naughty recently! She is the bestest doctor in our town, and can fix everything, so why can't she fix daddy?"

"Fine. I've decided that I'll write down anything that daddy said! Because I'm the big bad boss of The Moles!"
story.5:
"██/██/██, Address: The clinic. Had a heart-to-heart conversation with Hook. The contents are as follows:"

"Daddy Fersman was once a very good friend of mom and dad's. Back then, we all lived in a small town in the north. One day, mom went into the Fragmentum, and never came out again. Mom loved eating stone-grilled olm. Dad missed her so much that he made me stone-grilled olm to eat every day."

"Then one day when I came home, I saw dad lying on the bed looking very uncomfortable. I bursted into tears, and went to find daddy Fersman next door. He said dad was sick, and he took dad and me to see the town doctor."

"We stayed with dad at the doctor's place for several days. In the end, we almost used up all our money. Dad secretly told me to save the money. He also told me that he was uncomfortable staying there, and wanted to go home. So I went to daddy and told him I wanted to go home with my dad. But when daddy and I went to see him, he stopped talking."

"Daddy was on his knees and crying, but I didn't understand what was going on. Daddy explained to me that dad missed mom so much that he went to see her inside his dreams. I asked daddy, when will my dad wake up? Daddy just kept crying though and didn't answer me..."

"I didn't — didn't cry! No... Natasha, I don't need any tissues..."

"...Actually later I secretly asked the doctor something. I know that my dad is dead and won't come back forever, and mom is the same... I know that daddy doesn't want to make me sad, so he keeps on lying to me..."

"I know that daddy is the very best person in the whole world, and I like daddy the most..."

"So that's why I want to find lots of treasure with everyone, so we can build daddy a nice big house and help fix daddy!"

dialogue_lines.title: First Meeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: *sigh* So... I'm Lynx, a member of the Belobog Snow Plains research team. For work-related matters, please contact me during working hours. I'm unavailable at any other time. That's all, bye.

dialogue_lines.title: Greeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Hm... Sleeping bag, moisture resistant sleeping mat... All ready. It's time to go.

dialogue_lines.title: Parting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Mm, I think I'll set up camp here. I wonder if the aurora will be visible tonight...

dialogue_lines.title: About Self
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: For the Landau family, matters are simple: If you want to do something, go for it. I wanted to see the Snow Plains, so I joined the research team... It was as simple as that.

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Adventuring Solo
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: There's nothing to worry about when you're prepared. It's the unprepared you should be concerned about. Oh, you're worried about me always going alone? Eh... It's better being alone.

dialogue_lines.title: Hobbies
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Exploring the Snow Plains... Of course there will be all kinds of challenges along the way, but solving them is part of the fun.

dialogue_lines.title: Annoyances
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: It's such a bother to talk to people and try to figure out what they mean... *sigh* At least when I talk to Pela, I don't have to think so much...

dialogue_lines.title: Something to Share
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Beware of the mountain winds in the Kandor Valley — they are usually the harbinger of a blizzard. And never, ever stay in the canyon at night.

dialogue_lines.title: Knowledge
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Everything outside of Belobog is buried in snow, including all the history of the old world. But if we can bring it all back into the light of day by exploring the Snow Plains, then the choice seems simple: Just go for it.

dialogue_lines.title: About Bronya
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: It must be very tiring for Miss Bronya to have to deal with so many people every day.

dialogue_lines.title: About Serval
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I actually admire her for her many talents... Don't tell her I said that.

dialogue_lines.title: About Gepard
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: My brother is a very capable and very good man... It would be nice if he didn't worry so much about me.

dialogue_lines.title: About Pela
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: There are many things that only Pela can understand... Hehe.

dialogue_lines.title: About Sampo
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: He seems to be a wanted criminal that my brother is tracking, but I feel like I see him occasionally in the Snow Plains... Ah! Is HE the legendary Belobog Caveman!?

dialogue_lines.title: Eidolon Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Everyone needs some time alone...

dialogue_lines.title: Character Ascension
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Nice to have new survival skills under my belt...

dialogue_lines.title: Max Level Reached
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Even the Snow Plains have an end...

dialogue_lines.title: Trace Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Nice! I'll try it out in my next expedition.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Pela
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Shout if you get into trouble, Pela.

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Serval
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Never thought I'd get to fight side by side with you, sis...

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Gepard
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Stop holding me back, Gepard! I'm not a kid anymore...

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Perfect, now's my chance.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Stay calm now, Lynx...

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Commencing research.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Target specimen sighted, preparing for collection.

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Idling
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I should've brought a chair with me...

dialogue_lines.title: Basic ATK
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Excuse me, coming through.

dialogue_lines.title: Skill 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Relax, deep breaths.

dialogue_lines.title: Skill 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Time for something savory.

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Light Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ugh, I think something bit me...

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I've gotta stop the bleeding.

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Activate
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: To travel far away...

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Unleash
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: For a tough case like yours, we're gonna try them all!

dialogue_lines.title: Downed
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Brother... Sister...

dialogue_lines.title: Return to Battle
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Let's start again.

dialogue_lines.title: Health Recovery
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Just in time.

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Won
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Every step is just a part of the adventure.

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Looks handy. Into the backpack!

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: If they can fit in my rucksack, I'm taking them.

dialogue_lines.title: Precious Treasure Opening
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I don't have space for all this...

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Another handy survival skill.

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: So that's how it works...

dialogue_lines.title: Enemy Target Found
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Seems this path is no good either...

dialogue_lines.title: Returning to Town
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Get some rest while you can and gather your strength.

story.1: The youngest daughter of the Landau family, and one of Belobog's best extreme environments explorers. \nShe is highly capable of action despite her apparent lack of motivation. She only appears introverted and lazy to avoid unnecessary socialization.\nAs for what counts as unnecessary socialization — "Um, aren't all socialization unnecessary?"
story.2:
Scenes from the Snow Plains are far from to the daily lives of Belobogians. So far that a girl could only see them in her dreams.

During the days of her education, she always read about how the world before the Eternal Freeze was vast and varied. However, when Lynx asked her teachers for more details, they would always respond with an exasperated expression: "Only the deepest parts of the Snow Plains hold the answers to that..."

Lynx often heard from the teacher about the outlandish phenomena known as "aurora" in geography class. She found herself imagining the variegation and capricious alterations of that band of light. But when she asked her teacher why she couldn't witness such a sight within the confines of the city, they would always respond with an exasperated expression: "Unfortunately, the aurora can only be observed in the deepest parts of the Snow Plains..."

The girl was never able to get the answers she so desired for that vast world.

However, if her teachers were correct, then the answers behind everything could be found hidden in the Snow Plains.

So, wouldn't simply venturing into its depths personally be the resolution?

"So... I've decided that I want to go explore the depths of the Snow Plains!"
"Huh?"
"What?"
story.3:
"Lynx, you know how cold it is outside Belobog..."

"...It's not a big deal, Gepard. I got warm clothes and a heater. I'm all ready."

"But the Snow Plains aren't just dangerous because of the extreme weather. There are also all kinds of vicious monsters there..."

"...That's not big deal. Don't worry. Ran into some of them a few times when I was with the patrols before. I can handle them."

"Wait, when was that?"

"Uh..."

"Agh... Serval, give me a hand here. She's your sister too."

"Huh? Oh, she should get to do what she wants to do. Seeing our little Lynxy be such a go-getter about what she wants makes me real proud to be her sister..."

"...Hehe, thanks, sis."

"But Gepard's right: You need to pay attention to your safety when you're exploring the outside alone. Don't! Push! Yourself! Here, take these things too..."

"...What's this stuff?"

"This is the 'Vanguard' climbing pick you said you wanted to get last month. But don't you worry, your sister's got your back. I might've made a small redesign to it, but I promise it works well. Also, this is new 'Pathfinder' series snowboard from your brother. And, oh, this water bottle — a Goethe Hotel annual exclusive make. I changed the shoulder strap to your appropriate measurements and added some decorations. Also — also! These energy bars and food cans can fill you right up..."

"Uh, didn't you promise not to tell her about the snowboard."

"Agh, this really isn't the time to be stuck on that!"
"Anyway, remember to use these well and keep yourself protected out there. You hear me? I want to hear you promise!"

"...Alright, I promise!"
story.4:
"Lynxy? You there yet?" The girl's phone chimed a sharp sound from an incoming message.

Lynx sees the message coming from a familiar profile picture and is in no hurry to respond. Rather, she releases a steam-laden breath at the camera lens and carelessly uses her frost-coated gloves to rub at the device.

The camera remains perfectly operable. She lifts her phone and captures the night sky — clear, cloudless, and almost never seen within the walls of Belobog. Without wind nor snow nor stratocumulus to deny her gaze, only the dark velvet of the void stand companion to the scintillating canopy made up of shimmering stars.

Click... and sent.

The signal isn't very good. The air congeals with the ascension of altitude. Snow and night make silent bedfellows. Not long after, the sound of clicking is followed by a series of rings. It turns out the girl just finished her manuscript: the summit, the night, the stars.

Lynx smirks and points her lens at her tent, its shape inflating like a lung filling with breath. Again, she pressed down and snapped her shots. Click. Send.

Ding. The screen soon lights up again. This time, what is displayed is a woman's workbench, schematics and utensils strewn beneath the darkness of dimmed lights.

Click. Camping chairs and Lynx's favorite velvet blanket.
Ding. A glass of tepid milk.

Click. A cup of black tea steaming with warmth.
Ding. An iron table lamp and a girl's favorite picture album.

Click. A warm sleeping bag.
Ding. Disheveled bedding.

Click. A mountain top view towards Belobog, gazing upon the golden waves.
Ding. The shimmering streets of the Administrative District outside an apartment window.

Click.
Last was the resplendent aurora lights dancing in night sky in a sudden instant.
Ding.
A cute sticker follows. Lynx knows that girl only sends this one when she expresses envy.

So, she carefully makes a selection from her photos as a response...

"This will be good enough." They have tacit understanding of each other.
story.5:
"Why did Lynx choose to become a polar explorer?"

Lynx's close friend once asked her this question. At that time, she had no idea how to reply, so she brushed the inquiry off like a joke.

However, after that, Lynx also began to think about this question over and over again herself. Was she truly interested in ancient Belobogian history or geography? Or did she actually want to avoid socializing in a city trapped in eternal winter? Or...

Or perhaps the girl didn't even realize that, to Lynx, the way Landaus do things is pretty simple.

"If you want to do something, go for it."

Serval was obsessed with machinery and music, so she ran the workshop and became a rock musician. Gepard wanted to protect Belobog, so he became a Silvermane Guard captain.

Therefore, when Lynx suddenly announced to the family: "I want to venture deep into the Snow Plains," it was also simple as that.

Afraid of the cold? Then wear something warm. Afraid of the danger? Then learn survival skills. No one's done it before? Then Lynx can be the first one.

"After all, isn't it simple to just go from start to goal's end?"

dialogue_lines.title: First Meeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Oh, hey! I'm Luka, a member of Wildfire. Roughing up thugs and protecting the townsfolk is just part of my everyday job.

dialogue_lines.title: Greeting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The tournament's starting? Great! Let me get warmed up.

dialogue_lines.title: Parting
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Need a rest? Go! Tell you a secret though — a champion wins by training hard while others rest.

dialogue_lines.title: About Self
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I don't fight because I like violence, or want to win the championship, or to show off to anyone... I just think there are too many thugs in the Underworld and the kids need a good example.

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Mechanical Arm
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: My master said: Try not to think too much about what you lost — think more about what you gained. Every time I look at my arm, I remember those words.

dialogue_lines.title: Chat: Overworld
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: The Overworld? Not really interested. Unless, of course, there's a worthy opponent up there, or a bully that needs a good lesson.

dialogue_lines.title: Hobbies
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: A popular Fight Club motto: "Make friends with the one who hurts you the most..." No wonder everyone wants to be my friend!

dialogue_lines.title: Annoyances
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Vegetables... mushrooms... disgusting. Why is it whenever there's an extinction, it's never these things?

dialogue_lines.title: Something to Share
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Have you heard of the three wonders of the Underworld? Geomarrow, heartless supervisors, and Luka's fist of steel!

dialogue_lines.title: Knowledge
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: It's hard to believe, but there are folks willing to spend their whole lives putting hammer to iron or pickaxe to stone... I know, I know — not everyone has the opportunity to follow their dreams... but without dreams, I don't think I'd have made it this far.

dialogue_lines.title: About Natasha
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Unless my injuries are serious, I try my best not to bother Natasha. Too many people need her help, they shouldn't have to suffer for my carelessness.

dialogue_lines.title: About Seele
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Seele... Now, how can I coax her into joining the tournament? With her strength, she'll easily be crowned champion... unless she meets me! Ha!

dialogue_lines.title: About Svarog
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Gotta find an opportunity to beat that tinhead in an arm wrestle... Huh? You thought I was serious? Well, maybe the right arm...

dialogue_lines.title: About Sampo
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I don't need a middleman. Plus, anyone who calls themself "tall, blue, and handsome" definitely can't be trusted.

dialogue_lines.title: About Hook
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Everyone says Hook is too naughty, but I think she's a good kid. An example? Uh... guess I don't have any — just my gut feeling. Tsk, what do you mean "spoken like a true honorary member of The Moles"!?

dialogue_lines.title: About Oleg
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: ...Oh, uh, never mind — I was just wondering how much training I've got left before I can finally beat Master Oleg. I need to hurry up — if he gets too old it won't be impressive anymore!

dialogue_lines.title: Eidolon Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Niiiice, let's go!

dialogue_lines.title: Character Ascension
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Why train daily when you could train twice daily?

dialogue_lines.title: Max Level Reached
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: That's my limit? Ha, no way!

dialogue_lines.title: Trace Activation
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Very practical. Nice call!

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Seele
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Seele! Oh, this is gonna be easy!

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Natasha
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Stop worrying, Nat — I'm feeling fine!

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Hook
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Wanna grow taller, Hook? Eat more protein!

dialogue_lines.title: Added to Team With Clara
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Psst, Clara — any chance I can train with Mr. Svarog?

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: So! Give up yet?

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I'm just getting started!

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I could take you one arm only!

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Begins 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ha, small fry!

dialogue_lines.title: Turn Idling
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Better throw a punch or it'll be curtains, friend.

dialogue_lines.title: Enhanced Basic Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Need a hand...? My pleasure!

dialogue_lines.title: Skill 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Don't get cocky now!

dialogue_lines.title: Skill 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Snap out of it!

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Light Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: ...That all you got?

dialogue_lines.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: ...Now we're talking!

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Activate
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Where's the applause?

dialogue_lines.title: Ultimate: Unleash
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: An opponent worth their salt... Let's see some sparks fly!

dialogue_lines.title: Downed
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Gotta keep fighting...

dialogue_lines.title: Return to Battle
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Back in the ring!

dialogue_lines.title: Health Recovery
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Keep patching me up!

dialogue_lines.title: Technique
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Strike first!

dialogue_lines.title: Battle Won
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Now that's a gold-winning victory!

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Huh, another surprise?

dialogue_lines.title: Treasure Opening 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Huh? That's barely enough for one person!

dialogue_lines.title: Precious Treasure Opening
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Now that's what I'm talking about!

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Brawn's good and all, but what would it be without brains?

dialogue_lines.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Still got the brains!

dialogue_lines.title: Enemy Target Found
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: Ha, here comes the appetizer!

dialogue_lines.title: Returning to Town
dialogue_lines.Voice_M: I wanna find somewhere to put my feet up.

story.1: An optimistic and carefree fighter with a mechanical arm. Skilled in mixed martial arts and is a Wildfire member.\nFrom the fight cage to the battlefield, and from a fighter to a warrior, Luka uses his strength to protect the people of the Underworld.\nHe wishes to bring hope to others precisely because he had experienced despair himself.
story.2:
He lifts the steel hammer over and over.

Sparks erupt before his eyes, and the clang of metal against metal mutes the thuds of moving muscles and joints. The boy is not yet tall enough to reach the tools at the top of the steel cabinet, but the power with which he swings the steel hammer can already rival that of the most skilled craftsmen.

This shop is his entire life, with his father squatting next to the door and repeatedly cleaning the rusted old shop sign. Sometimes he would lie on his hard bed and imagine his future — but no matter where his mind wandered, his father's figure would always appear in his thoughts at the end.

He temporarily puts down his work as footsteps approach. His father stands up, and the older man's stout but bowed figure moves with a hint of groveling flattery. It's those people from Wildfire again. Ever since Moltammerville went under a curfew, they have been frequenting this shop and have increased the number of orders for various weapons.

As the boy thinks about this, he happens to stare into the eyes of that regular old customer who acts as the leader of the group. That man's skin is tanned and he stands tall, his sharp gaze immediately softens when he locks eyes with the boy. Then, he nods imperceptibly at the boy.

"Welcome, Chief Oleg! How can I help you today?"
"Patience, my good sir. I'm just here for a chat today." The man points at Luka. "A chat about your son."
story.3:
There is fire all around him, and the thick black smoke makes it hard to see. He keeps hearing screams and screeches as the fused scent of machine oil and blood sweeps over his nostrils. Luka tries hard to push down the urge to vomit.

The smile that Oleg wore on his face when Luka swung a perfect straight punch for the first time inspired Luka. However, once the boy had experienced the cruelty of the front lines first-hand, he never regained that warm feeling in his heart. Luka would secretly observe his comrades' expressions every time they lined up for action — and the apprehension he saw on those faces would actually soothe his own anxiety.

A scream pulls Luka back to reality. He rushes toward where the sound came from and sees a helpless child being backed into a corner by a monster. Instinctively, he leaps out and puts himself between the sharp ax and the child's fragile form.

A loud blast sounds from behind him. Luka hugs the panicked boy with one arm and slowly turns his head. The mutated monster had fallen to the ground, seemingly hit in the vitals by a stray bullet.

"Th—Thank you... mister..."

"Are you okay? Are you hurt anywhere?"

"Mister... your... your arm..."

His eyes follow the direction the child is pointing at. The sleeve that should have covered his upper right arm has been reduced to a shred of broken fabric, and blood is pouring out of his severed limb.

However, before he faints from the pain, he could once again feel that warmth swelling up in his heart.
story.4:
Luka is defeated at the final stage during the first championship he takes part in.

"Hahaha, how useless! This is the world of survival of the fittest — someone as weak as you shouldn't even show yourself before me!"

Luka does not mind the humiliation. His opponent for the final is an infamous thug in town known for his underhanded and cruel tactics. If I have to resort to this kind of tricks and deceit to become the champion — Luka thinks — then I'd rather never get my hands on the golden belt.

Luka runs into a few children around the corner from the Fight Club the night after. A short and skinny boy is curled up on the ground, his body covered in wounds while the older children surrounding him laugh in arrogance.

"Hahaha, how useless!" The leader of the bullies points at the wounded boy. "This is the world of survival of the fittest — someone as weak as you shouldn't even show yourself before me!"

That is when Luka swears he will become the Underworld champion — and he will do it his own way: fair and square.
story.5:
"We'll call it a day here. Come, boy. Take a seat."

"...This is all? I was planning to practice a few more sets today!"

"Oh, c'mon, stop pushing yourself. Get over here!"

"Hahaha. I'm coming. I'm coming!"

"Boy, I'm gonna ask you a question, and you need to give me an honest answer."

"Oh? What is this heart-to-heart we're having? Go on. Ask away."

"Look, when it comes to fighting... Do you actually like fighting?"

"Hahaha! Why are you asking this all of a sudden? Of course I do! Why else would I stick with you for so long?"

"Don't be smart with me, boy! Answer the question!"

"You're really serious about this... Okay. To be completely honest? I don't like it that much."

"Mmm... finally got an honest answer out of you. So, if the Underworld no longer needs Wildfire's protection... would you still train yourself as a fighter?"

"Mmm, lemme think... I probably will."

"Why? You didn't get into fighting because you want the golden belt. Don't think you can hide that from me. If the Underworld really became peaceful one day... would you still have a reason to fight?"

"Sir, I remember you saying that there are bad people in every era. Even if all the Fragmentum monsters die off, people would still fight to the death for every little thing."

"Hmm... I did say that."

"As long as there are still bad people in this world, and as long as there are still good people I need to protect—" Luka stands up, "then I will keep on fighting!"

1.SkillDesc: After Luka uses his Basic ATK "Direct Punch" or Skill "Lacerating Fist," he receives 1 stack of Fighting Will, up to 4 stacks. When he has 2 or more stacks of Fighting Will, his Basic ATK "Direct Punch" is enhanced to "Sky-Shatter Fist." After his Enhanced Basic ATK's "Rising Uppercut" hits a Bleeding enemy target, the Bleed status will immediately deal DMG for 1 time equal to 68% of the original DMG to the target. At the start of battle, Luka will possess 1 stack of Fighting Will.
